Reviews.Title: Was the quality of this item above or below your expectations
Reviews.Author: María Eusebia Díaz Guerrero
Reviews.Content: The product is brand is not offered in the notice, did not bring security, did not bring the manual or the bonus offered in the bid. All this calls into question its quality and durability.

Reviews.Title: Great Kids Tablet, Okay Quality, Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought four (yes, 4) of these for my kids for Christmas 2012. So they have been through more than six months of regular use. For $70 these are pretty good. They are definitely not iPads, Google Nexus, or Samsung Galaxies, but they are a good buy for your average 4 to 8 year olds. At this point, three of the four are still working and two of the four are working well. They work well for playing games, reading ebooks, watching movies, or taking silly (albeit low quality) pictures of oneself. They do all this just as well a Nexus.About two months ago one the tablets stopped charging, the battery still had a small charge (not enough to power up) and the charger was working. Something stopped working in the charging circuits on the motherboard. So that one is no longer usable.All but one of the chargers has stopped working, I think the wire or plug is too weak and broke, they worked if you wiggled the plug. Also the charging receptacle in the tablets is weak, one tablet's does not work anymore. And the USB port of another does not work. This has probably as much to do with the kids jamming and yanking on the cord, as anything.Fortunately, the USB connector does charge the tablet, so even without any of the chargers you can still use the tablets.The third tablet is very slow to react when tapping on the screen. This is most noticeable on the home screen, but also when playing games, though not as bad.Very odd, seems more of a software based problem than hardware.The fourth tablet, so far (knock on wood) is working fine no problems at all. Battery life has never been that great, two hours or so max. It hasn't diminished in six months so they are good quality, just not that big. Keep a smart phone charger on hand and they will last as long as you've got gas in the car.Overall, I am pleased with these tablet. Especially for younger kids, when you don't want to throw a lot of money down the drain (literally!) Trust me, I know, before they got these, my wife's Nexus, ended up in the toilet when two kids tried to grab it at the same time. Fortunately, it still works fine.We know they can take care of them now, so we will upgrade them one at a time, as they stop working. So far only one has had to be replaced. Pretty good as far as I'm concerned.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Sultan Khan
Reviews.Content: Its kind of cool Android tablet for kids but lacks little bit of speed. I would say you get what you pay for ...I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: AllLOSER -- the screen was lifted from the bezel had to return it.
Reviews.Author: Christian Glahn
Reviews.Content: So far I've not been able to use an Allwinner tablet enough to like or hate it.  I'll wait to see if I EVER get the second unit that I returned and was supposed to come back to me.

Reviews.Title: Fast shipping and great project
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I ordered my Zeepad on a Friday and received it on Tuesday. The product was exactly what it said it would be. It was a great buy.

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY. You WILL regret it.
Reviews.Author: jessica
Reviews.Content: Had the item for a little over 5 months and now it does not work.  I saw the negative reviews but like an idiot, I figured it wouldnt happen to me.  NONE of my apps work (even then the ones i paid for).  The color is crap.  Dont sit in the light while using it because all you will get is a glare on the screen.  I got this for my son who loves temple run, even he didnt want to play it.  You get what you pay for.  Never again.  A very poor investment.

Reviews.Title: Not as advertised
Reviews.Author: Patricia Sarju
Reviews.Content: I ordered this as a gift for someone. The specs indicated that this had a front and back camera...even the pictures show this. Delivery time was good....but product has only ONE Camera (on the screen section ) and not back and front as advertised. As to how it works....can't say as yet. I will have to wait for a feed back re that.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Rosetta Anderson "Rosetta Anderson"
Reviews.Content: I bought the zeepad for my grand-daughter who is 6 years old.  She loves it.  It locked up one time and I couldn't get it to turn off or anything.  My husband finally held down the power button until it turned off.  Overall, its a great product.  The downside is it takes a long time to charge up, but she usually does it overnight anyway.  You can download lots of games on it.  She has downloaded temple run I & II.  I am happy with this purchase.  My brother had bought her the meep pad and it didn't last 4 months.

Reviews.Title: love this tablet
Reviews.Author: Forquetta Cooper
Reviews.Content: We got it for my son he loves his tablet he never put it down yet . And for my comment before disregard it. My son love playing the free games from the Android market and it's very kid friendly. Very happy mom.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Kimica Reynolds
Reviews.Content: This product does exactly what it says. I bought it for my mom who isnt tech savy. She really enjoys it. This product is great for a person who is just getting started. Dont expect it to be like the i pad. Its also a great start for a child. Its great price wise also. Overrall its great.

Reviews.Title: I Like it
Reviews.Author: Marishka More
Reviews.Content: I like it but sometimes stops when using it. For the rest it works all right. I am satisfied with my purchase. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Jetonz
Reviews.Content: To Lagy freezes to much waste of money the display is horrible also the gets scratch so easy.........................................fgjoffidiztyssdyufcxxxggfccghj bugged chick. Cugfigffyictghcgjufguxhxghvjhcyvn b vcv

Reviews.Title: zeepad warranty is no good.
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: I purchased two zeepads for my grandkids for christmas. They both died. Amazon would not return them because it was after the 30 day warranty. It was a waste of money. No one can fix them. I just wanted them to send a new One out or find somewhere to get them working. The little android man just fell over. Never worked again.

Reviews.Title: For the price not bad
Reviews.Author: Christina
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product for my grandmother. She wanted to learn to use a tablet. For the size and price this little unit is not bad. The android platform it has is basic and easy to use. I can download just about anything I have on my phone or ipad and the resolution is decent too. Though my grandmother is still learning how to use it. It is a great little tablet for apps, games, travelling and connecting to the internet.

Reviews.Title: Slow piece of Junk
Reviews.Author: Bigt
Reviews.Content: This item is a waste of money, i purchased this tablet as a strater for my wife.  She has only used it to read books on.  The thing takes forever to turn on and up to five minutes to load a simple book over a high speed cable wifi.  SAVE YOUR MONEY!!!!  If I could return this i most definitly would.  Buy a Kindle or name brand first!!!!

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Meg C.
Reviews.Content: I recently bought this for my daughters birthday (7) knowing nothing about tablets and was really pleasntly surprised. I didn't give it to her yet because her birthday is still a little ways away but I have been playing with it, setting up the apps she likes moving the things she will play the most to the home screen, things like that, and its very easy to use and manuver. The size is going to be perfect for her and the price you cant beat. Its not an ipad so dont expct perfection, but if u have a tech savy kid and are tired of the old " its my turn on moms phone!" between siblings then this is for you! My only complaint is I have yet to figure out the parentel controls but close monitoring should be a close second to blocking. And I also wanna give it up to Goodios for prompt delivery and a courtesy email asking how I liked my product so far. I feel if you wanna buy this tablet, this would be the company to buy from.

Reviews.Title: I did not receive ** Bonus: Earphones, Stylus,Screen Protector
Reviews.Author: Will
Reviews.Content: I just got the tab in teh mail yesterday and have yet to figure out how good it is, but I am disappointed that i did not receive the ** Bonus: Earphones, Stylus,Screen Protector that was promised.Will update ASAP

Reviews.Title: Inferior Screen quality but the price isn't that high
Reviews.Author: Himanshu Anand
Reviews.Content: i got a device with a faulty screen and I returned it but irrespective of that the device was inferior in quality in its screen and speed as well. I tried installing the groupon app on it multiple times but it just won't work. The touch sensitivity wasn't great too. It is a cheap device but I decided to pay more and get kindle fire HD after working with this for couple of hours.

Reviews.Title: 57donn
Reviews.Author: Donn "Donn"
Reviews.Content: This item was just right for the person it was ordered for, I ordered it for my 13 yr. old granddaughter and she loved it.

Reviews.Title: Meets Expectations
Reviews.Author: Mirna
Reviews.Content: Its good for downloading apps, but the reason i give it 4 stars is because sometimes it just freezes. Its an okay product

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Lana Lee
Reviews.Content: Is does all the things it said it could do.  It had enough 4 GB capacity to do just about anything.  Love the portability of the Zeepad, screen size, Skype capabilities and Netflix movies.  Would be a great gift for a teen in high school or for anything that you can imagines.

Reviews.Title: Only lasted less than a month
Reviews.Author: ldb3
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday gift for my 7 year old daughter. It was a good tablet for a 7 year old. Able to download apps, upload her favorite music, watch her cartoons. Till one day the screen just popped off and once I snapped it back on it just wouldn't turn back on. Returned it back to Amazon, no exchange just refund. Ordered another one and again the screen popped off and snapped it back on and would't turn back on. Returning the second one today. Will pay a little extra and get a Kindle Fire. When it works I would give it Four and half stars, but poorly made product.

Reviews.Title: Good for price
Reviews.Author: S. Edmundson
Reviews.Content: It is a great size, made well. But the android system locks up quite a bit. The touchscreen freezes at times. But I suppose for the cost, it's good.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: ryan alton
Reviews.Content: i bought the zeepad for my daughter for her 6th birthday and she loves it! the touch screen is great however there is a delay sometimes but nothing that seems like a big deal. The company that shipped it was right on time. All in all its a terrific gift.

Reviews.Title: slow  to touchy w/ stylist too  short battery life  when strowing it enlarges way to easy  maybe 10yrs will like it
Reviews.Author: nadeen j puczylowski
Reviews.Content: it's a nice pink.  the stylist needs a home  it was for fun but to much time to get anywhere

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: nikkih
Reviews.Content: I bought this item for my seven year old son for his birthday. I did not want to put a lot of money in it being I was afraid that he will drop it. After reading reviews after reviews I bought it. This is perfect for him. I have not had any problems with it freezing up. While he has an account for g.c. to buy games there are plenty of free games and books.  The stylus has already torn. It has a rubber bottom that is used on the screen and it has come apart. No big deal use your fingers. There are no set parental controls on it, but my husband went on google and manually set controls for graphic material. So you can set controls it just takes a bit to do. THe battery isn't as long as an Ipad or other high end tablets, but that is a positive in my book. It usually last a good hr to hour and half of active use.  Overall I believe this is a good buy for a kid to have a tablet. If he breaks it I feel like I don't have a ton of money in it.

Reviews.Title: Both were defective
Reviews.Author: Mary Lewis-Chacon
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these pads hoping to get a good one.  Both were defective and the seller who took the money 2 months before they sent the product would not even answer my e-mail.  All I wanted was to have this fixed.  I would recommend only buying products sold by Amazon.  The customer service they give is eccellent.  I now watch who is selling the product.  I will never buy from bestinternational agian.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Brought this for my daughter....she loves it. She dropped it really good once..I snapped it back together and it still works. Great for a kids; Angry Birds,Temple Run, all those work. Buy this for ya kids.

Reviews.Title: Little detail
Reviews.Author: Eduardo
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablets a few months ago, the carrier company had some troubles transporting my package (to Venezuela) and I've recieved it 2 weeks ago. I'm very glad with 2 of the 3 tablets, very usefull, fast and elegant, but one of those came with a problem in the charger output, I have to push a bit left the charger or it will not charge the tablet, i though it could be some crashes in the travel. I recomend this product 100%

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0 Tablet
Reviews.Author: Keith Johnson "Livon"
Reviews.Content: This item was a gift to my mother she always wanted a small tablet to work with by doing her daily task to keep up with todays world of smart techs. So you know how it is with the older people to learn these computer gadgets.

Reviews.Title: horrible!!!!
Reviews.Author: maria marion
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my daughter, everything was in Arabic, and I couldn’t find any setting in English,When I tried messing with it, it kept turning off and on .  I called the store but nobody Answered

Reviews.Title: Zee Pad
Reviews.Author: kelly mancini
Reviews.Content: Great tablet, awesome for young kids! Second zee pad I have bought, I suggest getting the gel skin cover though to protect it from dropping by the kids.

Reviews.Title: Birthday Gift
Reviews.Author: melinda trosper
Reviews.Content: I bought this zeepad for my 7 year old granddaughters birthday. She LOVES it. I love that she LOVES it. It does everything she wants it to do.I am very pleased with this zeepad. No regrets, and certainly not any disappointments.

Reviews.Title: purchaced 3 not 1 works!
Reviews.Author: Jeana Simon
Reviews.Content: purchaced 3 of these for my children. 1 won't connect to the internet, 1 of the screens is broken (view) and the other takes about 5 minute just to get to one site.

Reviews.Title: Cheaply made
Reviews.Author: C. Carter
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 11 year old grand daughter and she LOVES it. I just didn't like how it distorts the screen when pressing on the back of it. It was cheaply made. Luckily, I purchased a case for it so that provides protection to the back and prevents my grand daughter from having issues with it. I give it a 4 star rating because it runs the OS extremely well and it runs the top apps also. Overall I think I made the right choice purchasing this for my grand daughter. She uses the Kindle and Netflix apps with not problems.

Reviews.Title: Does the job nicely.
Reviews.Author: Danger
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 6 year old daughter.  Seems to work well and is cheaper than an ipod touch.There are plenty of apps and it seems to work well, other than the battery life is about 3-4 hours.It's screen is lower resolution than the iphone 5 or ipad 3,  but it's perfectly fine for her usage.  I don't want her on the internet or doing e-mail or facebook yet!*** Update,  after not using the device for a week and attempting to boot the device,  it never got past the post screen.  I even tried entering Android diagnostic mode and couldn't get it going.  So I've returned it to the manufacturer for a refund.  I guess you get what you pay for and the fact that nexus 7 and galaxy tab 2's are only $50 more these days,  I was taught a lesson in not skimping on the kids ;-)

Reviews.Title: Great product for kids
Reviews.Author: Happy customer
Reviews.Content: The zeepad tablet works great, my kids love it, they enjoy playing angry birds and other preloaded games.I can check my email, facebook and use skype to talk to my mom. It really works great.

Reviews.Title: Decent for the money
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Tubbs
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a Christmas present for my 11yr son who loves "screens", and as a trial for owning this type of electronic. If he took care of this, we would move up to something like an iPad.  I decided to play with it first and perhaps add a few apps and music.  All went well until I got hooked on playing Angry Bird.  During my many nights of playing Angry Bird, the screen began to freeze.  I had to hit the power button once to turn it off (but not shut down) and then back on again in order to continue my game.  I certainly decided to NOT buy this for myself, but he seemed to enjoy it and worked around that problem.  He even watched Netflix movies and YouTube videos on it.  I'm not sure it he still had problems with it freezing.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Sherell Hill
Reviews.Content: Very great buy! I had an issue with it and sent it back to the manufacturer. They sent a new one back and its been awesome since then. I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: 7" zeepad
Reviews.Author: me
Reviews.Content: it works but is a bit slow .....roku is a better buy thans this,UNLESS you want it to be portable

Reviews.Title: Happy with this product!
Reviews.Author: T. Hill
Reviews.Content: Received this tablet on time. It is responsive and easy to use. I would recommend it if you are seeking an inexpensive tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Pamala W. Gambrell
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my tech savvy 3 year old nephew. He LOVE it! When he has this Zeepad in his hands, he doesn't tear up the house.

Reviews.Title: worst tablet ever.
Reviews.Author: Jmerc
Reviews.Content: I don't get the persons who gave these tablets high reviews because they stink.  I understand for the money you get what you pay for but man these turned out bad.  First off the power supply broke all on it's own then the port became loose and you had to hold the cord on a angle for it charge. The screens scratched easily and one even cracked. They would freeze up and you had to reset it and the battery didn't last long at all. My cell phone worked better than this product. So save yourself the trouble and don't waste both your time and money! Your better off spending some money and getting  a good brand tablet. As always "you get what you pay for!"

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Dina J Green
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a xmas gift for my grandson and according to my daughter it is awesome! Its even better than the one she at a different story and different maker for my oldest granddaughter. Now my granddaughter wants the same exact one!

Reviews.Title: Make a different purchase
Reviews.Author: meshop2
Reviews.Content: This is a purchase I regret making.  It has many issues- including disconnecting from the internet, screen freezing up, slow to respond to a command.  Sometimes it won't turn on or off.  Also the front screen is plastic.  It came scratched and since then has bubbled up in places.  Very cheap.  I guess you get what you pay for.  I would not recommend this Zeepad to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Dissatisfied Customer
Reviews.Author: Becky Porter
Reviews.Content: I ordered this item as a gift for my kids thinking it would be a great starter tablet.  Once we received the item, I was very happy with how easy it was to start using and the speed of the apps, specifically Netflix, as my kids watch their favorite shows on it.  And then it went downhill.  I had this product LESS THAN ONE WEEK when it completely stopped working. We used it to watch a movie on Netflix one evening.  I turned it off after using it and we went to bed.  The next afternoon, I attempted to turn it on so we could watch a movie since it was raining.  And nothing.  Would not turn on. I tried charging the tablet and nothing worked.  Needless to say, I was less than pleased.  What pushed me over the dissatisfaction edge is that when returning this item, I had to pay for return shipping; that shipping (since it is international) costs me $26.  So not only am I currently out the money I spent on the item, I am now out an extra $26 because I was sent a defective product.  I can understand if I wanted to return this product for my own simple reason paying the shipping. But when this product was defective and lasted less than one week after I received it, making me pay the return shipping is not the way to keep me as a customer.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet for the money.
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: Have an ongoing problem with using the charger.  Have to wiggle the plug around to get it to charge.  Other than that, the tablet is a pretty good item.

Reviews.Title: Very nice for the price
Reviews.Author: DT
Reviews.Content: Came with Angry Birds, Fruit Ninja, and a few other games pre-loaded which was nice. I was also able to download various apps from the Google PlayStore with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Took awhile, but its good
Reviews.Author: DT
Reviews.Content: Took about a week longer than they said and it practically was bare bones, no games or apps on it like the first one I ordered. But it wasn't a problem since I still had the history of my Google store from my other one. I simply downloaded the apps and its working fine. Power button does have the tendency to get depressed into the case sometimes though and is a pain to take apart and pull it out, but overall happy with the device.

Reviews.Title: 7" Zeepad tablet
Reviews.Author: travistodd
Reviews.Content: Hi I only had this produced for a few hours , In that time I spent the first two hours charging the tablet at the instructions said to do . Once it was Charged I tried to look  throw the programs , and how to get around all the wig jets and icons . I am not all the happy with it I found it to be a bit to slow , the camera 's picture was very grainy. I Think this would be best for some one that is real good with android systems . And some one that has real good eye sight. The price is grate. the size is grate for a child, and it seem;d to be made quit good .

Reviews.Title: after a week it would not turn on
Reviews.Author: patty
Reviews.Content: it worked fine for awhile then i went to turn it on and it wouldnt turn on realize it was inexpensive but was expecting more

Reviews.Title: Good for the price.
Reviews.Author: nicole
Reviews.Content: I knew buying this I was not going to get top of the line. It freezes occasionally (usually when it idles for a while), but I just simply turn it off and back on. Easy to use system, only took me about 2 minutes to figure it out without using the manual. I bought it for my three year old son and serves its purpose. I would say if it can hold up to my three year old it is pretty durable.

Reviews.Title: Good Tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Raffi
Reviews.Content: Works great form my 2 1/2 year old. little slow but for the price it is a ok product. Not as sturdy

Reviews.Title: nice product
Reviews.Author: destiny N.
Reviews.Content: i bought this product and gave it to a family member in another country, and they love it. It came in excellent timing and i still shocked as to how they got to me so quickly. Easy to use as well, thinking of getting 2 more for my kids.The price isnt bad but my boys are 4 and 6 and dont want to spend that much on it.

Reviews.Title: THIS IS EXACTLY WHAT I WANTED AND EXPECTED
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "BiloxiGal"
Reviews.Content: I got this for limited use while traveling back and forth to work on public transportation. I use it as an ebook reader more than anything.  It's exactly what I wanted.  I tried the least expensive Kindle, and found I just couldn't live with no color on the screen. I can download my ebooks from Amazon using the wi-fi at home with no problems.  The wi-fi setup didn't take any time at all.  The cost of the tablet is such that if I lose it or it disappears while taking it back and forth, I won't feel too bad.  I can also check my email once I get to work on a nearby open wi-fi network if I want to.  I installed a 16 gig sd card on it with some music files yesterday, but haven't tried it yet.  However, the transfer was a breeze.  My computer recognized the tablet, and the tablet showed the USB symbol that let me use it as another drive.I am very satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Deion
Reviews.Content: i got scrathed really easily but it was good and it also legged aloti couldnt play bike race and stuff like that

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS TABLET!
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: First of all it came straight from China and took almost a month to arrive. I bought it for my 14 year old daughter who is very tecno savvy more so than I. It worked for one day then half the screen stopped working and the image wouldn't rotate when you moved the tablet up and down. I shipped it back and it cost me 28 dollars to do so. Still haven't heard any confirmation on whether they have revived it yet and still no refund for the tablet or the shipping cost. Learn from my mistake and stay clear of this product and spend the little extra for a quality Android.

Reviews.Title: Great first tablet for your kids
Reviews.Author: A. Rodrick
Reviews.Content: It works like my Ipad , but the price was far less and I wont feel bad if the kids break it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent first tablet for my 6 year old
Reviews.Author: A. Rodrick
Reviews.Content: Pros: The price was great, the ease of use is great,Cons: Very hard to find replacement wall charger,car charger, I have one on order from engine69, hopfully its the correct one.

Reviews.Title: the zeepad works great but
Reviews.Author: Gregory sudds
Reviews.Content: i brought two and one of my 14 year old daughters power button has been push in now it won't work at all. what can we do about this ? i really like your products and would like to continue to buy but.  I need the peace of mind when something goes wrong we can resolve it in a timely you have my contact info

Reviews.Title: it was broke
Reviews.Author: Gregory sudds
Reviews.Content: This product was broke when shipped or received the screen did not work and was cracked i shipped it back to china and have not received any info yet ,and cant seem to find a number on them please resolve this problem

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I expected
Reviews.Author: jwjaram
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son's 7th birthday.  He loves it!  It does everything we need it to do, movies, music, books, games...and more!  Android devices are easy to work with!

Reviews.Title: Kid friendly tablet
Reviews.Author: NolaBigDawg
Reviews.Content: I purchased the tablet for a four year old, I didn't want be an expensive in fear of it being broken by children.  I was expecting it to be just something for the kids to play angry bird on. To my surprise it was really a good tablet, you can download from google play, screen was really responsive, and the micro Sd slot was really a plus.  I would definitely by another in the future

Reviews.Title: Junk!
Reviews.Author: DJ BRAND-X
Reviews.Content: Dont buy it.  I cannot for the life of me figure out how to download anything with this piece of junk!  So disapointed.  I thought it would be a pretty good deal because it was at a good price and it would have made a good xmas gift.  Its been sitting under the coffee table since the day after xmas because its trash!

Reviews.Title: Did not work for me!
Reviews.Author: Jade
Reviews.Content: This would have been a great product for my 8 year old, if I could only get the touch screen to operate to input the Gmail info. Maybe I just got a defected tablet. *shrugs* It has been returned and I ordered something else. Hopefully this will work much better.

Reviews.Title: 7" Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Pamela Dunbar
Reviews.Content: Love the color, awesome item and received in good time. This was a gift for my oldest granddaughter she will be using it as she goes off to college in the fall.

Reviews.Title: very nice for Grandma
Reviews.Author: servozoom
Reviews.Content: a nice tablet for "disposable" use, give it to the kids or seniors without worry,  Cheap and that's the way it should be.  The KISS rule....  a simple basic tablet.  Use free app Wifi Oh Player and stream from your network.

Reviews.Title: Kids love the Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Terry L. Kennedy
Reviews.Content: Wasn't quite sure what to expect since the price is so much lower than others out there.  Delivery was way quicker than they estimated. Came in perfect condition. Kids love it and haven't put it down since it arrived. It does everything it said it would and they love the color. I am planning on ordering another for the kids and one for myself!!!

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7"
Reviews.Author: bobbye
Reviews.Content: It met my standards. Just wish it had Bluetooth and a backside camera. The battery life was a disappointment, after on a few moments of movie watching it had died.

Reviews.Title: Better Then IPad if you just what something small.
Reviews.Author: Jason Pittenger
Reviews.Content: I got this for my wife that is not a techie. She has a I phone a uses it but her Nook was first gen. This works like a good e-reader, Facebook, and Pandora tablet.

Reviews.Title: Its actually not bad.
Reviews.Author: Arnie Posadas
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my grandmas 1 year old nephew and I had the chance to test it out first and install things before letting the baby handle it. It is pretty responsive for its price and it even got most of the common things that are available in most products like camera, wifi, OTG cable. Although this one did not come with bluetooth, probably for the cost. I was planning to use a bluetooth speakers because although this device comes with speakers..... the sound is really low when trying to play a lullaby song.Overall, you get what you paid for and for this one, I think we got more than what we paid for.

Reviews.Title: Barely adequate...
Reviews.Author: Nick L Coombes
Reviews.Content: I knew at $65 that I was pushing it but this tablet is very buggy. I have a permanent pink line to the left of center screen and it has lots of issues...That being said...useful for travel...but that's about it...

Reviews.Title: Not a bad Tab
Reviews.Author: Thomas L. Cole
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet for my 18 year old daughter who likes it very much. It can Skype and works with Google Play so you can get new apps. She uses it as an ereader and for chatting with friends. In all it is a nice tablet, comfortable in your hands, is very thin and has a good picture. The battery life is not as good as high end tablets about 4 hours of use but, is better than expected for the price of the tablet. I did not expect it to be this nice of a tablet and have been very surprised with its performance. She has not used it for watching movies yet but it works well for checking email and weather when you are in a hurry

Reviews.Author: Tyrell
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my wife a week before Christmas, the price was awesome.  I recieved it on Christmas Eve, just in time for Christmas morning.  And my wife loves it.

Reviews.Title: Really good tablet
Reviews.Author: Gina Paola Cepeda
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the product, it is easy to use and I bought it because is going to be a surprise for my mom. Although I cannot find a way yet to use the keyboard I bought with this tablet.Please I really need help finding out how I can set the blue tooth up on the tablet if this this is the only way to make it work.Thank you.

Reviews.Author: Moraima Materano
Reviews.Content: Was better than expected the product surpriced me with its quality and presentation-Great accesories-So Much qualityI recomend this product to anyone who waits for a excelent product

Reviews.Title: Low battery time
Reviews.Author: pallend
Reviews.Content: the tablet works fine the only problem is how long you can use the tablet on battery only, the answer is about 2 hours

Reviews.Title: Actually Not Sure
Reviews.Author: Jaime
Reviews.Content: I cannot really rate this product as I never actually got it. I was suppose to receive it in 3/19/13. It finally showed up on tracking like a few days after that and never made it here. To boot the company asked if  I changed my mind about it that when I received it to send it back to them, to Hong Kong - I'm guessing at my cost. They did refund my money however.

Reviews.Title: Horrible product
Reviews.Author: E. A. Moran
Reviews.Content: I had problems since  the minute I opened my box. had 1st one for only 2 weeks.. The second would not even work unless plugged in the wall outlet. Cheaply made. Buttons are inconveniently placed. Personally spend a few more bucks for a better brand.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work
Reviews.Author: Kevin Schwarz
Reviews.Content: I followed all instructions, but it was stuck on the Android screen. Tried to put new firmware on it, that didn't work either. Easy return.

Reviews.Title: NOT GOOD!!!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This tablet s very reasonable, but its very cheap!!! I dropped the tablet on carpet and it broke.... I tried to get in contact with the company and they still haven't responded. Zeepad is very unprofessional

Reviews.Title: IAM SO GLAD MY FRIEND TOLD ME ABOUT THIS PRODUCT.
Reviews.Author: chasity
Reviews.Content: IT VERY EASY TO USE MY SON LOVES IT..  IT IS SMALL ENOUGH I CARRY IT IN MY PURSE WHEN HE DONE PLAYING IT .  THE ONLY THING IS I WISH THE BATTERY LIFE LASTED LONGER..

Reviews.Title: Cute little Zeepad gadget!
Reviews.Author: Jannie Annie
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet as a reader for my granddaughter. I decided to test it out before giving it to her. I have to say I am quite impressed with it. It worked great right out of the box. I followed the directions and charged it 2 1/2 hours before using it. It is so cute in pink. The graphics are nice and the speed is good. It has some handy pre-loaded aps such as Facebook, Google and fun games I know she will like such as Angry Birds and Fruit Ninja. It is so much more than a reader. I've only had it a couple of days and it has an ap for the reader but I haven't had time to test that yet. It completes with much more expensive tablets so I have to say so far I'm very happy with this purchase and you certainly get much more than your monies worth!!!!

Reviews.Title: My 9 year old  grandson love it
Reviews.Author: correy bradley
Reviews.Content: No problem easy to operate n downloads it came in excellent condition and I will purchase another one in the near futre

Reviews.Title: Best for games, not for internet surfing
Reviews.Author: Pete Sakes
Reviews.Content: My Android cellphone with budget service (Boost) has an easier time loading webpages than the zeepad running off of wifi.I bought this for my daughter, however, and it is for her to download and play android app games, not surf the web, and it is great for playing games. I have had a few freezes, but only while trying to visit webpages, none yet during game play. I will update if anything goes completely kablooey with it. I'm pleased with what I paid for it, as it works for its intended purpose. Had I bought it for personal use, I would be very, very disappointed. I purchased a GTAB Nero by Matricom for myself and had to return it. It was practically dead on arrival. Now I've purchased a (slightly) more expensive iRULU 9 inch for personal use. I haven't received it yet, so we shall see...

Reviews.Title: Great little tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: M. Anema
Reviews.Content: It's a little slow at times, definitely not a games tablet, though all angry birds games play just fine. For a simple reader, it's very good. Battery life is very good also, lasts for a week with my use. I've been able to install all the productivity apps that I have on my iPhone, they all work great (with wifi, of course). One note- don't bother trying to get to the website to flash the firmware- the English is so bad it doesn't make any sense!!!!

Reviews.Title: It doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Melanie
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son for his birthday. We gave it to him just to find out that it won't work. WiFi says its connected but won't connect to the play store. It won't connect to any pages on the internet. Not happy with it and now we have to purchase another tablet for my son.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: krissyh78
Reviews.Content: These are very durable and great to do about anything.  I bought it as a gift for my 9yr old and he absolutely loves it.  Only downfall is that the battery does not keep a long charge.

Reviews.Title: Great Device!
Reviews.Author: Matthew L. Keiser
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for our 2.5 yr. old.  After downloading some children's aps it didn't take him long to figure how to turn the device on and off and open his games and puzzles.  It is quite durable and has survived a couple of drops to the floor and keeps on going.  The screen resolution is no i pad retina but we're not streaming movies or anything like that.  My wife and I have a few of our own aps as well and we love to use it too.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE
Reviews.Author: FooFoo123
Reviews.Content: I must admit, When I first got this tablet I was VERY IMPRESSED! but after 2 months of use, it no longer would charge and would freeze up ALL THE TIME. Returned and bought a better one with a 8GB.

Reviews.Title: Very good value priced tablet
Reviews.Author: Larry A. Costigan
Reviews.Content: The screen isn't as bright as the Apple or Google tablets (I have both), but functionally it's right there with them.  Very nice tablet for the money.  Great value!

Reviews.Title: Great gift for 7 year old!
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves this tablet.  We haven't had too much trouble using it with her, save for one app that decided to quit working.  Only real gripe is that the Micro USB port is positioned at the top of the unit.  Meaning you have to drape a connection to a USB keyboard either around the tablet or behind it while it's positioned in a case.  other than that, great!

Reviews.Title: my kid loves it
Reviews.Author: FIDO
Reviews.Content: its a good bad for a kid not that expensive and it douse the job, you get what you pay for

Reviews.Title: I like it!
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my 8 year old daughter and for everything she uses it for this is perfect! A good starter tablet!

Reviews.Title: its okay
Reviews.Author: Ana Carrera
Reviews.Content: its okay for the price, and well what can i say my little niece likes it, so that is good. but needs improvement

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: jackie
Reviews.Content: buy it for my daughter, why not let me use my phone ... was a great solution, and it works well, the only thing is that sometimes it is hard to select options on the touch screen

Reviews.Title: Worked for a few days then crashed!
Reviews.Author: Nelly
Reviews.Content: We received the tablet and the first two days it worked great but then crashed. The screen went blank and did not work regardless of what we tried or by contacting customer support. When we tried to return it and exchange it for a new one, they first stated they would pay for the return shipping but later wanted us to pay for the return shipping and said they would refund us. By other comments I realized that other customers were never refunded and I knew that the shipping would be close to the same amount of what we paid for the tablet. It was a good working tablet at first but you will be taking a chance of this happening to you as well.

Reviews.Title: follow up.....Seller replaced tablet..excellent service from company
Reviews.Author: wyatra patterson
Reviews.Content: I wanted to follow up on my past posting of this product. Let me start off by saying the company contacted me and sent me a replacement, they even refunded my shipping cost to my credit card. The previous product could have been damaged during shipment. My son loves the tablet. I am in the process of ordering a jacket cover in case he drops it.It come preloaded with a game, but you can always download more free games from the internet. I recommend this product.The touchscreen is great and responsive. The web pages load great.

Reviews.Title: So far so good..  I take that back!
Reviews.Author: Steve D. Yates "The Yates Family"
Reviews.Content: Product came super fast, packaged well. Daughter loves it, but still learning things, like where to put the music. Not of caution; the user guide was obviously not written by a person who speaks English. The moderately tech savvy person can figure it out,but if you have no technical skills this may pose an issue. Other than that so far so good. Will update if necessary.October 2013This item is crap! Now it won't charge after seven months, spend a little extra and get a better one.

Reviews.Title: Execelent Product.
Reviews.Author: Moises Caballero
Reviews.Content: is a Good Product, sure is not an Ipad or something like that but its good enough for the price.

Reviews.Title: On time but discharging so fast
Reviews.Author: Connie!!!
Reviews.Content: I consider this product ok because I was specting It has a durable charged battery. I goes down faster. That make me disappointed..sorry but It is happening...in the other hand the applications work fine.

Reviews.Title: it works great and fast i like it
Reviews.Author: sihame
Reviews.Content: it works great and fast i like it  for the price is really  great better than to buy an expensive and your kid can broke it at any time . now I put game on it. I put my pdf courses that I use them when I study while I am riding the train. I put word and excel on it and it work perfectly I download videos the image is great. the only think that I don't like is the camera is only a basic one not sophisticated but does' t bother me. I am satisfied with that product

Reviews.Title: Ehhhhh. Its ok.
Reviews.Author: David Johnson
Reviews.Content: The tablet shipped very quickly!! I opened it up and the tablet was brand new. No problems at all except for lag and the screen is crappy otherwise its good for the money.

Reviews.Title: This tablet is awesome!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Lakesha green
Reviews.Content: I give this tablet 5 stars. This tablet is awesome. I brought four tablets as gifts for my kids and they just love it. I was easy for me to set up wifi on it and it was very easy to download various apps and games using the google play store. Great tablet for the price. I'm thinking about getting one for myself.

Reviews.Title: had a problem
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: The mini usb port stopped working on 3rd day, although tablet fun and seemed to work great otherwise , my android keyboard would not work which took 50% of the fun out. I had to return to Amazon , no problem there, they payed for return shipping and issued me an immediate refund which I am happy for. I am getting a very similar replacement, my son and wife and keeping their zee pads  so far they are doing ok

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Amber
Reviews.Content: Perfect for kids!  Great price for the product and has all the features that we we needed for the kids.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Brittani
Reviews.Content: was very hesitant with all the terrible reviews but i LOVED it! it was truely worth the 80 i paid! AWSOME TABLET FOR ITS MONEY :)))))

Reviews.Title: Cheap
Reviews.Author: Tosha Miles
Reviews.Content: We had it for a couple of weeks... My son dropped it and parts flew everywhere. Total waste of money!

Reviews.Title: 7-inch Android
Reviews.Author: edson quarton
Reviews.Content: Very good Tablet the touch screen is very good and the weight of the tablet is not heavy. It is very slim and it is worth the price thank you .

Reviews.Title: sorry to disappoint you ,but this product did not work on internet
Reviews.Author: mike ferraro
Reviews.Content: could not get a connection at all,tried several times and had help from a tech also. will not purchase anything from you again,thanks

Reviews.Title: Good for toddlers
Reviews.Author: Blaire roy
Reviews.Content: My 3 year old never let me have my kindle so I got rid of his mobigo and bought this zeepad. Has great storage capacity for the games for kids. Even downloaded some videos for him to watch offline almost all games are available for play without the Wi-Fi on. The only thing I don't like is the screen it's seems like 3d and sometimes makes it hard to see. The touch screen is perfect and comes with some pretty cool accessories. Perfect for younger kids.

Reviews.Title: Should have read more
Reviews.Author: Edward Amarille "Edward Amarille"
Reviews.Content: for a basic tablet, this isnt too bad, but with only 512 MB of RAM, memory management is an issue. The battery doesnt quite last as long as I would like, but it can handle basic social browsing if you are not trying to rush through your apps.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Marco Perez
Reviews.Content: My brother loves this tablet to death. Was purchased as a christmas gift. You pay for what you get pretty much

Reviews.Title: zeepad..wont hold up!
Reviews.Author: priska
Reviews.Content: Ok..so I bought this for my fourteen year old and eight year old for Xmas..unfortunatly they didnt even last a couple of weeks..the screens are extremely fragile and they both ended up shattering..I own a kindle fire.my kindle has survived both boys and a three year old and has been dropped numerous occasions and still manages to work perfectly! My opinion is to save your money until you have enough to buy a good tablet.one that will withstand time. Like a kindle or galaxy tablet. Both of those tablets can do exactly what this one did and then some!

Reviews.Title: For the price I guess its OK.
Reviews.Author: Kevin A. Hendricks
Reviews.Content: Pro's: Its cheap and screen is very bright at nighttime. Touch sensing seems to work just as well as the top brands. Is already rooted before you receive it so thats a bonus.Con's: Seems to be made with some cheap plastic. Screen is hard to see when its bright outside and you pretty much HAVE to be right in front of it to see it. Doesnt run very fast and does seemed dated. Definitely make sure you get a Micro SD card for this model, cause 4GB just is NOT enough room, especially considering you have slightly less than 2GB available with the OS on it.

Reviews.Title: instructions
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: It would be OK if you are smart at these electronic devices. The instructions are not easy to understand and able to read

Reviews.Title: Good purchase for my children!
Reviews.Author: Hernan
Reviews.Content: Used for about a week by my children of 5 and 7. Hope these tablets continue working well! The only issue with the 2 tablets received is the quality of video calling by using Skype (better to turn off the video and just talk).

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Julie Miller
Reviews.Content: The kids loved thier new tablets, easy to operate, and very durable, we had purchased 2 other tablets that lasted 2 weeks.

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: francisco rodriguez
Reviews.Content: used it for a few months and enjoyed but it but something happened with the power cell and now its just a big old paper weight. now i have to get it fixed..

Reviews.Title: Too slow for YouTube and Pandora
Reviews.Author: P. Pan
Reviews.Content: Hello,  This product is good for basic internet search and e-mailing.  I was hoping to use it to watch YouTube videos and listen to Pandora radio while traveling without having to have my laptop with me. It was very hard to control the volume as it would constantly go to zooming instead, disappointed, I chose to return the item, paid $11 shipping and they charge 15 percent restocking fee.

Reviews.Title: Recomendado como vendedor
Reviews.Author: franklins sifontes
Reviews.Content: Muy responsable , productos llegaron a tiempo y en buen estado.. recomiendo  abiertamente. . . . . . . .

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: nick
Reviews.Content: Great deal for a tablet. Works good and great apps on the android store. I like everything about it and am 100% satisfied

Reviews.Title: great little tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Patricia Moorman
Reviews.Content: I consider it money well spent, it is very easy to take it with me everywhere I go. great buy

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Maria Adams
Reviews.Content: This small pad is easy to use and light weight. My daughter who is 10yrs old enjoys it the most.

Reviews.Title: Good little Zee Pad
Reviews.Author: Patricia Folsom
Reviews.Content: After seeing my Granddaughters that she received for Christmas I thought this would be something to pass time with while on field trips and waiting for the kids. It's not real fast but gets the job done. I just wish the battery would last longer because sitting on a bus you have no way of charging it up. All in all it's a great little pad & my other 2 Granddaughters are getting them for their birthdays.

Reviews.Title: Well
Reviews.Author: celestine butler
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for. I got it for my son because he keeps messing on my iPad. This is not a product I would use but it works for him.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE
Reviews.Author: B. Wells
Reviews.Content: Too bad Amazon doesn't allow a zero star rating.  It broke the second time I turned it on, which was really no surprise when I opened the package and saw what was being considered a user's manual.  Here is an excerpt:1. If you long time don't to use this Tablet...Yes, the entire user's manual is written this way.  Do yourself a favor and spend the extra money to get a decent tablet. This one is garbage.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad purchase
Reviews.Author: ranman43072
Reviews.Content: I actually recieved this tablet 2 days earlier than expected which was a good thing becauce it was for my Grandson's Birthday. Well packaged and it worked right out of the box. I did however charge it for 6 hours as suggested from other reviews before setting it up. I have hade no issues what so ever and have recommended this tablet to many friends for the smaller fingers in thier famlies.The price was great for my budget and I will probably buy another one for my youngest Grandson as soon as he is old enough.

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy This Product
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Olson
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this product. I bought two for my granddaughters. One granddaughter locked hers up before we could put anything on it and information I was given from Zeepad did not work to reset the tablet. Just do your homework first before you buy this. Now I have a tablet that no one can use and I was not able to get a replacement. I will never buy from another seller on amazon again if it has to do with electronics. I ended up buying my granddaughter a kindle fire and she just loves it. This product is a loser!

Reviews.Title: Great for my husband!
Reviews.Author: mandy
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for valentines for my husband, and he loves his new tablet. This is his first tablet, and he found it easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: It showed only the android screen when I tried to turn it on.  I had to return it.
Reviews.Author: bobbie wortham,
Reviews.Content: Did not meet my expectations,  The instructions were not clear and had bad grammar.  Hard to understand.  It has no comparison to the Kindle Fire

Reviews.Title: First ever tablet
Reviews.Author: Jeanne Bidlack
Reviews.Content: It does do almost all of what I expected except the camera is terrible.  The tablet surface is like a mirror and there is not eye hole to take picture, so uhless you want pics of yourself it's awful!!!!

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: butler
Reviews.Content: We are happy with this,  but would be happier if the skype video worked. It was for my grandson , it was so he could video skype with his nana. But other than that he likes it and plays on it . The directions need to be a  bolder and larger print for easier reading.Thank YouTerri G Butler

Reviews.Title: Great for the price and if you only want to browse the web.
Reviews.Author: Frederico DosSantos
Reviews.Content: The pad is quite durable; I carry it with me everywhere on my backpack and it gets tossed around quite a lot. A plus is that it comes with a screen protecting sheet(that you have to apply) but its one less thing you need to worry about buying and if you are looking at this guy, you value saving some $$. The plastic cover is quite solid but the edges do scuff up pretty quick. The battery lasts about 2 hours and that is acceptable for the price. If you are thinking about using this as a PC substitute please keep in mind that after the OS you only have about 1.9Gbs of space left; bought a 32Gb microsd from scandisk and the system recognized it right away; but only as a 29.8Gb device(might be file system configuration, but that's enough space for me. It comes with angry birds and fruit ninja installed and it was a great excuse to have some random children play with it and although they handled it as if it was made of solid titanium; it came out with minor scratches, but non on the screen because of the protector.The major down side for this device is the charger; as noted before it doesn't fit all the way and most of the time you have to "giggle" it around so that it will start charing; but the usb cable charges perfectly, just takes longer; I get a full charge from 2% to 100% in about 15 minutes on wall charger and about 23 on usb.I would have given it a 5, had it come with bluetooth or at least gps support. Tried a few bluetooth adapters but was not able to get it to be recognized; but did not do much other than plug it in and wait a minute or two.

Reviews.Title: ZEEPAD
Reviews.Author: Michael Stone
Reviews.Content: Basically got the item for the Grand kids, it has performed well, a little slow but for the money it has stood the test, was shipped in a very timely manner, easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: 7.0 Zee pad
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: We got a 7.0 zee pad for our son for his 8th birthday and we love it, very simple and does everything iPod does but 100 dollars cheaper thanks amazon

Reviews.Title: Zeepad issues or is it from the seller? But, I do have some positive info too
Reviews.Author: April D Cobb
Reviews.Content: Not sure if all my problems with this tablet is from the unit itself or from the seller I bought it from in Hong Kong. That was my first mistake not reading thoroughly as I usually do and not buying within the United States. The tablet was slow doing anything,the battery life seemed to be short,there is no reset button to try. The settings menu for example looking up battery use you couldn't tell where you stood it says like 40% and then it would die. But, that wasn't the biggest issue as had it for a month and now it's completely dead. Now, if we go with just a bad tablet it happens and or something about the seller and overseas I can't answer about this tablet as it gets rave reviews which is why I bought it. One big positive I can say is the Amazon A-Z Guarantee. Make sure you have it. I asked them to step in when I was only having trouble before totally dying and I believe in less than 24 hrs. it was resolved and I received a full refund.  Another big positive to have on electronics from Amazon is the Square Trade Warranty. It's worth the extra money. I have had to use it in the past on another item and that is also everything you read on reviews. Easy,fast,amazing. Trying to be fair. Give it a try,buy within the United States, purchase Square Trade Warranty and that's my opinion.

Reviews.Title: This product stinks!
Reviews.Author: amk3mom
Reviews.Content: This is a piece of junk.  It is very cheaply made, the buttons do to work half of the time.  The charger doesn't work.  We had purchased two for both of our kids and we have to share one charger now.  Do not purchase.

Reviews.Title: My zeepad
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: I enjoy it. But i can't delete unwanted downloads, and it's beginning to run slow. Still I would recommend it. It was delivered on time and all n all it works just great.

Reviews.Title: its not bad
Reviews.Author: Ibrahim
Reviews.Content: i bought 3 Zeepad and i found one some aria in the screen not workingbut the other two working fineso in general it good

Reviews.Title: Very good item, for the price
Reviews.Author: uveprom
Reviews.Content: I was installing a game and stuck suddenly, and never again go into android, always stuck showing zeepad 7.0 on screen, but i did find a website with the firmware, i fix it doing reflash! now is in good working condition![...]

Reviews.Title: Ok considering the price
Reviews.Author: DebRT
Reviews.Content: Tablet works ok. Skype does not work on it, as I can't get video calling to work. Tried to uninstall and reinstall and it didnt work, even though I had enabled video calling. I was very disappointed in this. Also, battery life is poor. A fou hour charge will last about an hour and a half of normal use. Otherwise, the tablet works well and I am happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Android Tablet
Reviews.Author: Bunny
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my grandson and in the past purchased 4 others for members of my family.  Everyone loves them.  I have a larger one, but may order on in this size since it seems to be a good size to carry in my purse.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Terriprud
Reviews.Content: Only down fall is that the camera does not work for Skype  one of the main reasons my daughter wanted it.  However, great value for the money.  Bought one for my self

Reviews.Title: Awsome product for the price...
Reviews.Author: Robbie Huff
Reviews.Content: Awsome product for the price...  This is my first tablet and I love it.I really like my Zeepad tablet. For the price I got it for, I think it was really worth it. It does most of everything I was looking for in a basic tablet.  A friend recommended this table and I'm not disappointed at all for the price.

Reviews.Title: Died after a months use
Reviews.Author: Theresa2674
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these items for my children for Christmas.  Both had to get shipped back to Engine99 after a months use.  One of them, there is no longer any sound.  The other one, the power button broke and got stuck inside of the unit.  I shipped everything back at my cost (approx $25), to only get a call from them saying that I have to purchase parts for repair and that they are giving me a great deal.  Sorry, but a great deal to me is to fix the unit at no charge at all since it died after 30 days!!  I paid the $20 parts fee.  I also asked what the guarantee is on this "new part" that they are installing.  They informed me that there is no guarantee on it and if it breaks again, I must pay for it again.  I do not recommend this product.  Also, this product went on sale almost half off 20 days after I purchased it.  Fantastic!

Reviews.Title: Great for what I wanted it for
Reviews.Author: ellen.nbs
Reviews.Content: I wanted a tablet to use when traveling to play games and check my emails from - this is super for that. The only negative comment I have regarding this product is that it does not hold a charge very long. Need to keep it plugged in if I am using it for longer than a half an hour or so. Great for the kids to use so I don't have to give up my phone or laptop.

Reviews.Title: zeepad 7.0
Reviews.Author: THOMAS JACOBSEN
Reviews.Content: This was purchased as an entry level tablet /e-reader and is just about what I expected.I have experienced no real issues performance wise,I am quite satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: capacitive screen too sensitive.  random characters
Reviews.Author: M. Marcotte
Reviews.Content: 2 out of 2 were disapointing.  Don't buy cheap tablets.  You get what you pay for.  Battery life is 50 percent of similar well known tablets.

Reviews.Title: thank god
Reviews.Author: helen
Reviews.Content: Finally we have a winner. Its great. Works fast. Its durable. Last long. Great for the kids. My friends loves it

Reviews.Title: Sadly, this was a disappointment
Reviews.Author: Patricia
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 of these for my grandsons for Christmas.  They were awesome units, but within 2 weeks of use, they both crashed a few days apart with sudden grid lines going in both directions.  I emailed them asking for a refund, but they insisted I send them back for repair.  I did, and after several emails back and forth (they couldn't find them, needed my tracking number, etc., which thankfully I had and kept), asking the status of the repairs, they finally agreed to send me a refund.  I will say they promptly did process the refund, but I am out the return shipping for the repair.  They are a great concept, but I honestly cannot recommend them, at least from the company I purchased them from on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good toy.
Reviews.Author: Thomas Rossetos
Reviews.Content: Does everything I need it to do with email, apps, and surfing the net.  Also enjoy playing a good game of chess on it.

Reviews.Title: my new tablet
Reviews.Author: teresa o'dell
Reviews.Content: love my new tablet easy to use, and cheap...and it's easy to carry around and use it at work on break...

Reviews.Title: Fantastic buy!
Reviews.Author: Gargirl
Reviews.Content: My 14 year old daughter got this for Christmas from my boyfriend & the product was great.  She managed to break it though in less than two weeks by putting it in her over filled backpack so she bought herself (this) a replacement.  Great product for the money!

Reviews.Title: Zeepd
Reviews.Author: dianamozee
Reviews.Content: I loved the Zeepad, but it became defective after only two weeks. I returned this item on January 13th, and have not seen a response one way or another from engine 29. This is very unprofessional. I liked the Zeepad just fine, it was a great little tablet, I am however unhappy with Engine 29

Reviews.Title: Lasted one month
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: This was a fine inexpensive tablet for a month. Unfortunately the wifi quit working as soon as the return window expired and will not turn on, making the tablet useless. I've done a factory reset and tried getting the wifi to work in several different locations with no success. Trying to turn it one results in a "turning wi-fi on..." message which never goes away and never connects. Would not recommend this item.

Reviews.Title: great buy...
Reviews.Author: Qadir
Reviews.Content: came very quickly.bought this for my wife to use as an ereader...she loves it...its working very well,no problems so far...cant complain...however wanted to buy one for myself but it went up by $16.

Reviews.Title: rbowers
Reviews.Author: rbowers
Reviews.Content: This is suppose to be new I paid for the new one and got a used sratched one that runs slow.

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: rbowers
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these one black one pink suppose to be new, but they both seem to be used,since the screens are scratched and they run very slow. They are for my children and they cannot understand why they are scratched and neither can I.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 before this one in local stores and neither worked great.  This one is a great deal for kids who want a tablet but parents don't want to spend the money for the more expensive ones.

Reviews.Title: Screen is terrible / wireless is not working correct
Reviews.Author: S. H.
Reviews.Content: It took a month to get it in the mail, the screen is not good quality, there a lines that go through the screen. One of my friends purchased this item as well, after a few weeks the charger piece and power button fell out, she was not able to return it. I would rather pay 70 dollars more and get a kindle fire or google android tablet, and don't have to worry about it falling apart.

Reviews.Title: broke, won't charge after 1 month
Reviews.Author: putput
Reviews.Content: Broke after about a month.  The charger that came with it broke right away and then we charged it with a cell phone charger, then it quit charging altogether! JUNK!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding item
Reviews.Author: LeRoy Campeau
Reviews.Content: I have purchased this as a gift and my granddaughter loves it. For the money this gift is awesome when it comes to down loading apps and the learning apps help her.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Gabrielle
Reviews.Content: I bought as a gift for kids ages 5-10 & they seem to like it, so I guess that's all that matters. Took a little longer to arrive but I guess since its coming from overseas then it goes through customs.

Reviews.Title: Price matches Quality
Reviews.Author: Alejandra J "Zen Mind"
Reviews.Content: 79.00 for a tablet computer is pretty cheap.  Sounds good for our 9 year old son.  He had it only for two weeks.  The power button got loose and fell inside.  The screen got slightly scratched.  The screen was hard to see unless in a perfectly lighted room, not too bright.  If your child is not hard on equipment, thre Zeepad may be a great starter computer.

Reviews.Title: not impressed
Reviews.Author: Felicia W
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mom for Christmas, and she only plays games on it. Since it uses WiFi only, she's not able to use the bible at church, even though that was basically the only reason I purchased it. She's unable to download the bible for use outside of WiFi.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Stephanie L Buchanan
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to run a few apps.  It streams videos great.  My only very minor complaint is the viewing angle.  You must be looking at it straight on and not from an angle or you get the gray screen, which is no big deal to me.  I would definitely get another one.

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: amii
Reviews.Content: good product and gret  price for a 5yr old toddler and a preteen the love it. looks nice in a case as well.

Reviews.Title: otherwise I'm satisfied...
Reviews.Author: glaudimar
Reviews.Content: actually wanted to add that the sound is very low, I buy other headphones and ecuchaba better and higher. so I advise you to throw away the headphones that brought and buy better quality ones.otherwise I'm satisfiedsaludos desde venezuela

Reviews.Title: greatly satisfied
Reviews.Author: sherry
Reviews.Content: The tablet works wonderfully.  Thank you so much. The little computer arrived well packaged with cool accessories. It's a beautiful color. The pink tablet started right up with no problems. It attached to my home Wi-Fi effortlessly.  It's really neat and is communicating with my other toys well so far. I've only used it twice now, but it seems quite cool. Thanks. Sherry

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: nisha
Reviews.Content: Very good tablet for the price. Brought for my nephew and he loves it. Referred to others for their kids and they love it also

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: meeka
Reviews.Content: It was delivered on time.The price was a steal $83.00 just hate after I ordered it the price droped to $63.00 I purchased the pink tablet for my 7yr daughter to keep her off my phone.Let me say she LOVES the tablet works it like a pro.

Reviews.Title: took to long
Reviews.Author: monica
Reviews.Content: We were happy to get it for our grand daughter we ordered it january 4 th and it took 3 1/2 weeks to get it this the slowest moving i have ever gotten on line and after it got here it had lines going through it.

Reviews.Title: help
Reviews.Author: res
Reviews.Content: now it will not boot past logo screen and I can't find anyone who knows how to do a hard reset.98q

Reviews.Title: Zee is no i, but its good for kids
Reviews.Author: David M. Fitzgerald "-Admiral Dave"
Reviews.Content: It's a good buy if you have realistic expectations of what you are paying for. My boy loves it and it works with the most of the popular apps and games from Google Play so far. It would not play Grand Theft Auto, which leads me to believe that support of intensive 3D games could be spotty. Battery life isn't great so bring the charger if you will be using it when out and about.

Reviews.Title: excitement died quickly
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: Product seemed ok upon arrival but quickly had issues with dead spots on screen and freezing up a lot. Had great hopes for it but that excitement died down quickly.

Reviews.Title: Bought two of them
Reviews.Author: trudy carey
Reviews.Content: Got these for my grandsons at Christmas. I didn't want to buy a high dollar one due to their ages. They love them! One of the boys dropped his while charging and it did not break! A adult might want something more but for the price..this one is great!

Reviews.Title: Cheap
Reviews.Author: A.Sellhausen
Reviews.Content: I bought the tablet for my boyfriend for Christmas. i was disappointed the only way to get sound was to use earphones. We didnt find out right away. Other than that you get what you pay for. He likes it but i will buy a better one later on.

Reviews.Title: GREAT FOR KIDS
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I brought this for my daughter it's a great price and I loved everything that came worth it but it would not let me connect to the internet w/wifi. The wifi button was defected b/c it froze and i couldn't do anything.

Reviews.Title: Sucks
Reviews.Author: Jon Gold
Reviews.Content: I didn't even get it this guy rips you off. Don't get it I'm telling you. Don't fall for what I did.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad review
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: The first one I received was DOA. It only worked for the first 8 min and then came back on again. I had to return it back to get a new one. The second one works great and I haven't had any problems with.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Shavon Mo
Reviews.Content: My baby sister can't get enough of it.... all she wants to do is play on her tablet. So its very good

Reviews.Title: wrong tablet
Reviews.Author: shakur
Reviews.Content: I ordered the zeepad paid 94.00 and git a 49.00 cheap no name android tablet from somewhere in China with instructions written in Chinese. So disappointed! My rating is 0 stars til I get the correct tablet!

Reviews.Title: Many problems
Reviews.Author: lisa walker
Reviews.Content: So far we've had difficulty with every task: downloading games, netflix, setting up email, getting it to charge...everything. It's been a headache.

Reviews.Title: a great tablet!!!
Reviews.Author: michelle drabek "momof3_theyremyworld"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 7 year old... A GREAT PLUS is that it came with Google Play, so we can download all her favorite games and find new favorites!  This tablet is darker than it looks, it's more of a hot pink (deeper in color)...which is perfect for my daughter!!

Reviews.Title: love the zeepad
Reviews.Author: nikie boyd
Reviews.Content: my daughter love this product so much and also love it to and apparently some one else loved it to because a week later it was stolen but I will be replacing it very soon but I love it It deserves ten stars!

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Heven
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves it... Although Everytime I try to log on Netfilx it won't load, but other than that it's and awesome tablet for her:)

Reviews.Title: good for the price.
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Product is fair. USB port stopped working 2 days after I received the item. Also shipped with a defective USB cable. Did receive earlier than was stated by the shipper though, so that was a bonus.

Reviews.Title: wont last forever
Reviews.Author: Chelsea
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my 4 year old to keep her off my phone, we downloaded a kid lock app where we could control what she could and couldn't do and she has enjoyed it very much!  Notably slower than my phone, but apps like Angry Birds and Temple Run did not lag at all.It is still a light weight tablet and did not last more than 4 months. There are two charging ports and eventually both of them gave out making the tablet unusable.Spend a little more for a dependable longer lasting tablet. Avoid Allwinner, Zeepad, TabNero,Chromo, Tagital, Matricom and ZTO. They are all the same tablet under different names.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Bunny
Reviews.Content: Ordered it just before Christmas...got it on time!!!  It was a gift and the person who got it loves it.

Reviews.Title: so cute!!
Reviews.Author: C. Watts "PR lover"
Reviews.Content: i bought this for my daughter... its perfect!! almost all her games were free i was able to lock the play store from unexpected purchases.. only downfall which isnt the companys fault is locking the setting feature!!

Reviews.Title: from Michigan
Reviews.Author: nancy weeks
Reviews.Content: bought this for grand kids ages 4&5 they can navigete them well and love them, they love to play games on their tablets.

Reviews.Title: I finally got one!
Reviews.Author: P. Mitchell "prmit"
Reviews.Content: I received tablet  within  the stated time frame. Was excited about that considering  I never received my tablet from the first company I ordered from.The tablet was purchased as a Xmas gift for a 5 year old and it appears to be perfect for that.  The screen is not hd quality, the headphones appear to be needed for sound, and the touch screen can be unresponsive at times but for the price I think it serves it's purpose pretty well, so far. I had no problem setting up the WiFi and logging into the internet.  Downloading games was really fast too.  I think my grandparent will love this. I' m considering buying 2 more for my other grandchildren.

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC PRODUCT!
Reviews.Author: LINDA DIEBOLD
Reviews.Content: Bought for my kids for Christmas!  They have downloaded all their favorite apps and when they are at school, I play with it! LOL

Reviews.Title: NOT WHAT I EXPECTED
Reviews.Author: poorboy
Reviews.Content: This Zeepad android i order for my Granddaughter is not what I expected...Cant download games; and someone keeps sending e-mails to the address.  I have even tried to download free games and always get an error..The most thing my granddaugher like is she can take pictures and Video..Now I have to figure out what to do, also, the product said it comes with Netflix...it don't.  I have Netflix account and tried to access through Google, got through but still could not watch movie, it seam to just stall.  My thing is I think this is a refurbished Zeepad; because it was already set up under someone else account...

Reviews.Content: My daughter got this for Christmas and within a week the pen was broken.  The tablet never allowed us to type certain letters so we could not log into our google account and download apps.  Sent it back

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Got this for our 8 year old daughter.  She loves it!  Easy for her to use.  I already have an Android type phone, so she already knew how the App store worked.  She has been able to download lots of free games and activities. The only thing we are still trying to figure out is how to get her some music.  But, over all...GREAT!

Reviews.Title: Purchased for my 4 almost 5 year old granddaughter
Reviews.Author: Gramma B
Reviews.Content: She only puts it down to tend to her new baby alive doll  Loves the preloaded Ninja Fruit game Great item

Reviews.Title: Like a big android phone but a little better
Reviews.Author: redd-fish
Reviews.Content: I own a Samsung stratosphere phone that runs on android 4.0 and this tablet looks and feels almost just like the phone except larger. The only real difference is that the apps tend to be more encompassing and sort of like a medium between what you would see on a phone and a laptop. It's a very nice substitute for a laptop if you use the right apps and perhaps buy a keyboard for it (the virtual keyboard is nice but I wouldn't want to write an essay on it). The battery life is great just as long as you don't leave the wi-fi connected to it all the time (I've had it on for almost 3 days and the battery is at 65% w/o using wi-fi). The screen resolution is a bit rough but not unbearable. Overall, for the price it's a great little device. I didn't mean to rhyme that .

Reviews.Title: Fair
Reviews.Author: Nky
Reviews.Content: Like: the color and size was perfer for my daughter, the price was affordableDislike: Very fragile.  Do not buy it for kids yonger than 10

Reviews.Title: Not durable
Reviews.Author: Nky
Reviews.Content: like: size and price.Dislike: very fragile.  I wish the product was stron enough to last more than one week,  the parts came apart and the screen broke.

Reviews.Title: its ok

Reviews.Content: I like the size, its for my little girl and she loves pink so i like the colour but if i had notice that it only has a front on camera i probably wouldnt of chosen this model

Reviews.Title: Pink zeepad <3

Reviews.Content: It works just as good if not better than my friends kindle! I would recomend this to anyone love it! Such a great deal aswell!

It works well enough but is not terribly well constructed, feels flimsy and the screen is loaded with scuffs and scratches after just a couple weeks of use.  It needs restarted at least once per day due to it acting strange.  Under the same cir cumstances, I'd buy it again.  Not a good substitute for a Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price`
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Got this for my 9 year old son for Christmas.  It's definitely not an iPad.  Has a plastic face that scratches easy.  Some things don't adjust to which way the screen is turned and looks like things are missing, for example putting in the passcode. But for $80 bucks I just wanted something that works okay and maybe last a year since.  What can I say, I'm poor.  So far my son has loved it!  It has a good operating system.  Connects to the internet.  Nick can download games and watch Netflix.  So far so good!

Reviews.Title: Good for the price!
Reviews.Author: kristy
Reviews.Content: Overall a good tablet. My daughter loves it! The charger sparks when you plug it in so I would get a new one, but so did the one for my cell phone so I guess its not that uncommon. It works great and having almost everything I wanted preloaded on there is a big plus!

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift

Reviews.Content: I bought this device for my 5 year  daughter for christmas. So far so good. It does everything that my android phone does and more. She has enjoyed playing games and using the different apps. The only downfall is that the battery doesnt last all day but for the price I can't complain.

Reviews.Title: POS!
