Reviews.Content: Let it be said....You get what you pay for! & Buyer Beware! The pad is very slow, i bought it for my 6 year old and she loses interest in it quickly because it takes so long to start an app.

Reviews.Title: Its ok i guess

Reviews.Content: Bought it for my son he loves it .. its slow also.. although i ordered the pink one for my daughter and never got it and had to file a claim.. the one i did get was an ok tablet.. saddened my daughter never got hers for xmas though..

Reviews.Title: ZEEpad...great

Reviews.Content: ZEepad is a great tablet. I just recived it today came with two games already installed (angry birds,fruit slice) the tablet is andriod 4.04 & has play store. Front camra is alright. Speakers are good and pretty loud. Bottom line its a great tablet at a great price.. Recommended

Reviews.Title: love it

Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed with the quality of this product. The first one I got would not hold a charge, so I had to order a replacement. The seller was very good about sending out a another one, so I give them props for that!The replacement is no better. Apparently, you get what you pay for in a tablet!

Reviews.Title: don't bye

Reviews.Content: Was the color n price I wanted to pay for my daughter and came nicely packaged but wouldn't power on. Very upset about it after I had to patiently wait for it and it was supposed to b a birthday gift. It just ruined my daughters day. If a no star rating was available that's wat it truly deserves

Reviews.Title: freaking perfect!
Reviews.Author: Wendy Cromer
Reviews.Content: I love it!! its perfect for what i needed it for. took a min to find a case it would fit in cause its small. but as a Pure Romance consultant i LOVE the fact thats its PINK!!! :) <3

Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: Mgilleo
Reviews.Content: The screen goes blurry and pixelated look. Then the charge cord quits working all together. Completely useless now being I cant charge it

Reviews.Title: Won't Charge

She was trying to lay it against a pillow to charge when I discovered the problem. Seemed like a fire hazzard to me so I am attempting to return the thing now.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Retrosexual
Reviews.Content: Got this to replace a tablet with cracked LCD for a 7 yr old.  So far, it performs just fine.  her only disappointment was that it didn't have EverNote app.

Reviews.Title: buyer beware you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: I wanted to get something that was budget wise when it first arrived i was excited cause i bought 4 for my 4 kids..they were charging and was working but after 1 week, 3 of them wouldnt charge anymore even if it was plugged in the power wont turn on..the screen would freeze..and now only 1 is working functional..i'm crossing my fingers they either let me replace them or get a refund..there goes 300+ bucks down the drain

Reviews.Title: this product is no good
Reviews.Author: Maribel Lebron
Reviews.Content: This product came defective. it freezes alot and changes sites on its own. Now i want to return it and either exchange it or get my money back. I have to wait for the company, engine 29, to respond back and approve my return. This really sucks. It was suppose to be a christma gift now the person has to wait longer for a gift because it came defective.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: Sandra
Reviews.Content: This product is no worth it price it freezes all the time I got it for my sisters kids and they couldn't even do anything with it. Every time they clicked on a n application the thing froze then the battery was horrible it was only good for 10 mins this is not a good product and there were no way to get a case for it either.

Reviews.Title: The product came on time
Reviews.Author: kane
Reviews.Content: I got the Zee pad for my 15yr old and she loves it. the apps are easy to install. I brought 4 Zee Pad

Reviews.Title: A Seriously Good Deal for a Surprising Little Tablet
Reviews.Author: Shoof "trice di cinema"
Reviews.Content: My wife has a Google Nexus 7 tablet and the latter is my only frame of reference for functionality and quality.I purchased (3) Zeepads for my grandchildren and they arrived 12/22/12 instead of the scheduled 12/21.  All were about 85% charged.  Each Zeepad connected to my wi-fi home network in a matter of seconds.  Touch screen was responsive and a breeze to navigate.  I am pleasantly surprised with the overall build quality and remarkable functionality of the Zeepad.While not as fast as the Google Nexus 7, which has a hotter Arm Holdings designed processor, the Zeepad's speed is quite adequate.  I was drawn to the Zeepad since its processor is also an Arm design and the Android operating system is tough to beat.  Image or screen quality is inferior to the Nexus but decent.  The difference can be noticed when viewing the screen from an angle, but as long as the view of the Zeepad is straight on, the quality is good, not great.  To put the review in perspective, remember the Zeepad is well below $100 and, at this price point, I think this product is a real value.  Actually, it is a remarkable surprise.  My grandkids opened these on Xmas Eve and within seconds were connected to the net and gazing at more apps (mostly free games) on GooglePlay, where android apps are offered in abundance.  Did not experience any slowness as mentioned in some reviews.  Perhaps the network? Durability is an unknown since we have had the Zeepads for just few days so I'll follow up in a month or so.  While I was very skeptical that a tablet would do all the things claimed, after seeing the Zeepad in action, I wish I would have grabbed one for myself!

Reviews.Title: Frozen
Reviews.Author: Arrie
Reviews.Content: The first week this item worked fine, but after one week it it began freezing up.  Sent back to company.

Reviews.Title: Received a USED Zeepad!!!!!
Reviews.Author: I am 4 YHWH r u
Reviews.Content: I ordered in in Dec., it arrived Jan. 17th.  The first sign that this was not going to go well was the way it was packaged...or the lack of packaging.  LOL.  The tablet comes in the box that you would find it in any retail store, then it had only one layer of bubble wrap covered by a layer of packing tape. What kind of a company packs like this???  (it is not packed into a shipping box).It only gets worse, the screen is extremely scratched, and raised above the frame on one side, and it had a half worn sticker on it.  The WIFI must be within 2 feet in order to connect...but the browser doesn't work anyway.  Also the unit will not charge at all if the tablet is turned on.Despite all this we were able to download a couple of games that did work well and were a ton of fun at first, that is until they started to freeze up.I contacted the company on the 18th, and they responded back saying the item is new and "show us a photo where is the scratches.thanks!".  So I replied back with pictures.Next they agreed it was scratched and offered to send me "the film" to repair it and a new charger.There is so much wrong with this Zeepad that a screen and a charger wouldn't come close to fixing it.  I replied back that I did not pay full price for a used, disfunctional tablet that I would have to fix.Their last response was just one short sentence..."pls ship back we refund you.thanks"Evidently they also want me to pay to ship this useless, previously returned item.  It is so disappointing.  Hopefully they aren't planning to ship it off to the next unsuspecting person.Hmmm, I guess when I get back home I will need to dig out the layer of bubble wrap they used to box it???  I just don't have time to deal with stuff like this...how disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Don't Purchase from this company!
Reviews.Author: TNB "TNB"
Reviews.Content: Tablet stop working the first day i received it. 4GB is a lie, more like 1GB. I don't know if buying the TF card will help the limited storage problem, but it pisses me off because i can't download movies for my kids! I haven't allowed it to charge the recommended initial six hours, but battery drains very quickly! The return policy is ridiculous, 20-50% restocking fee for items that aren't defective is highway robbery! This company(Engine29) has a problem not the tablets. I've heard nothing but good things about the Zeepads, so i can only assume that they knowingly sell damaged products. It's suspicious to me, my items arrived without warranty info, generic user manuel, and no information on the product or on the user manuel about the maker of the product. Amazon suggested i "Bing or Google"(no lie) the maker, they only had an email address for Engine29. I'm greatly disappointed that Amazon doesn't have more info on who they do business with.

Reviews.Title: It didn't work consistently....My son couldn't wait for me to send it back!
Reviews.Author: Raina
Reviews.Content: It Froze.Wouldn't shut down.Was very slow.Didn't pick up quickly.Camera was not good.Son was very dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: Virtually unknown.
Reviews.Author: Jason Thomas
Reviews.Content: While this device has performed okayish for the past few days since we got it, there is no information on the manufacturers or support what so ever! the device has no serial number, no fcc id and no way to contact the manufacturer for support. Already experiencing a few crashes and poor battery performance.

Reviews.Title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY1
Reviews.Author: dawson1mama

They would turn on and you could see backlighting on the screen but no picture.  I could excuse one not working, but not all three.  The first one broke 4 days after we got it.  Returned all 3.

Reviews.Title: power packed
Reviews.Author: Evert Robinson
Reviews.Content: This unit has all that you will need...its durable, has the latest OS,and the Capactive screen is super senseitive...I would recommend this unit to anyone.

Reviews.Title: my zeepad
Reviews.Author: Jo ann linville
Reviews.Content: Well trying to figure it out is the hard part but I am not technology savvy. Once I set up my google account I could download books which was the main purpose. but it does all kinds of things.

Reviews.Title: Nice for the price and for the little one!
Reviews.Author: Bizzykidz
Reviews.Content: Was very anxious to get this and yes a little nervous to! Just wanted something inexpensive for my 7 year old to use and this is perfect! Already downloaded some of his fave apps that he plays on my iphone and they work great!

Reviews.Title: Very Nice For the Price
Reviews.Author: D Mack
Reviews.Content: This product was a Christmas gift for my 11 yr old daughter. After having it for over a month, we are quite pleased with its performance (for the money). I paid $72.00 for it, and quite honestly, I was a bit nervous, thinking that the quality and performance might not be that good.We were pleasantly surprised! The packaging was nice and the item was nicer than expected. It's NOT a workhorse, but for simple web surfing and downloading and playing games, its near perfect. My daughter even uses it for school as a dictionary and research tool.I've noticed that the battery doesn't have a very long life, about 2 hrs at best. I'm not too worried about that because it's rare that she uses it for much longer than that.If you're looking for an inexpensive, quality tablet, this is a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Low Battery Life Freezes All The Time!
Reviews.Author: Ashley Sova
Reviews.Content: Got becasuse of the reviews. I actually purchased one for my little brother for Christmas first and thought the first one was fine. This one though seems slower and freezes way more often then my brothers. Also, on both the battery life sucks! Ends up dead by the time you get into the first scramble words game going. I also purchased a larger SD card (16) because once you get it with all the apps that are already on it...not a whole lotta room left. If it could have a better battery likfe and not freeze so much would be so much happier with it! I am definitly saving my money for the new IPod Touch...just thought I would start off with a tablet to see if I'd use it. I would use this a whole lot more if it worked better.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Tabs
Reviews.Author: mmmagrady
Reviews.Content: I bought four of these tablets for Christmas in 2012.  I returned one right away because the power button was stuck on, causing it to continuously shutdown and start.  I was refunded my money for this one.  I sent two of these tablets to step-children out of state and was recently informed that one does not work and one does.  The last tablet, I gave to my--at the time---3 and 1/2 year old son.  He loved it for a year, then just after Christmas 2013, it stopped working.  It won't turn on or charge.  I have since bought a couple more tablets that are name brand and a little more expensive, but they work with no problems.  I don't think I would purchase the zeepad again.

Reviews.Title: Start
Reviews.Author: allenbrig
Reviews.Content: Had trouble with start button and the screen saver.Sometime would not start and could not get bubbles out of the screen saver.Final,could not start at all.

Reviews.Title: Excellen
Reviews.Author: Ernesto Torres
Reviews.Content: all came to my entire satisfaction, I can recommend widely to make their purchases hereby, all my products came to my entire satisfaction

Reviews.Title: Please do not buy
Reviews.Author: Hanson R.
Reviews.Content: Please do not buy this zeepad 7"tablet on less you have money to throw away please learn from my experience I bougth two zeepad tablets for my kids for christmas last year (2013) and after one month there was a problem with one it was not taking charge I returned it to amazon and was refunded. Now the next tablet is getting extremely hot when in use I will return it , my kids told me better  I should of purchase two post cards with the money for the zeepad tablet .I am sorry kids.  So once again do not buy this zeepad tablet......................

Reviews.Title: Perfomace was very poor.
Reviews.Author: Roger Scheele
Reviews.Content: Do not purchase this product unless you have a lot of time on your hands to wait for all the minor lag and crashes it has incurred. Returned it in the first 3 days of purchase. There are several other products out there in a similar price range that work.

Reviews.Title: Blah
Reviews.Author: DannyDevito
Reviews.Content: Nice color, but thats where the good ends. The damn thing freezes constantly. The LCD quality is pretty bad (think mid 2k's cell phone screens). They for some dumb reason put the phone version of android on, so it is constantly searching for cell signal even in airplane mode. You get about 30min of battery life due to this. Upon research, this is a common problem when putting the phone version on a tablet. To fix the issue you have to Root the tablet, and being it's a China tablet, probably not wise as it's almost guranteed to brick it. Save up and get a Kindle etc.

Reviews.Title: Lousy zeepad rendered useless after 1week  never received it.
Reviews.Author: larry powell
Reviews.Content: It stop working  after 1 week machine freezing  unable to open programs.not worth sending for repair I purchased insurance never came in mail.

Reviews.Title: Easy break
Reviews.Author: Ada Rivera
Reviews.Content: This I ten is poorly made. It was dropped once and the case came apart.  It was a gift to my niece, I was embarrassed.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the $60
Reviews.Author: Brenda Fonseca
Reviews.Content: I knew I was going to get something cheap but it is not worth it - I wouldn't even spend $10 for this device.  It was frustrating, slow, wouldn't charge and the screen was very poor quality.  Would rather have spent the money on craft supplies and let me kids play the old fashioned way

Reviews.Title: not happy
Reviews.Author: reinaldo garcia
Reviews.Content: poor image quality in a lot of issues not really happy with this item. picture quality is really bad bad

Reviews.Title: Buyer beware
Reviews.Author: Jamie Elisabeth Mathis
Reviews.Content: My sister bought two of these for my daughters last year for Christmas. The seller was Goodios.  She ordered them in November. The first order never shipped and they refunded her money without sending a note that it didn't ship. She reordered them two weeks before Christmas. They shipped from China and finally arrived in February. Of the two the charger for one didn't work. I wasn't too concerned because we could just use the other one.  After a week the charger won't make a connection with either tablet. It doesn't go all the way in and sit flush. Wish we had known and my sister could have saved some money and bought the girls a present they can actually use!!! I tried contacting the seller but since I didn't by them, there isn't much I can do.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for! "Kds Toy"
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 5 year old boy. He loves my I Pad mini so I thought this would make a good starter. He still wants my iPad! The tablet runs slow. You can't play a game or watch a movie because something is always updating. At times the screen dosn't  respond to touch. It has a few glitches. Over all I guess you get what you pay for. It works, and it's cheep enough to let the kids play with it without being worried the caust of repair. If it would have been bought for myself I would send it back! I wish I would've paid the extra and got him a tablet just for kids for around $100.00.

Reviews.Title: Maybe for a child
Reviews.Author: Edgardo Maravilla
Reviews.Content: Maybe this one will satisfy a child and not a full grown person like me. I was thinking of having a tablet without spending much,but this one is now wasted as I cant find any use to it. But my niece may like it. Not recommended for full users(my own opinion only).Please dont ask me any further question or inquiries as I have nothing to share.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk....
Reviews.Author: selcuk mumcu
Reviews.Content: We bought this for my 2.5 yr son thinking he would eventually break it and it would be easy to replace.  However, it did not even last 4 - 5 months.  Battery died!So, my verdict is.  Don't buy it...The old adage holds true:  " I am not rich enough to buy cheap products."I don't know if it has warranty.  I will see if I can get a replacement.  Probably not.

Reviews.Title: Poor excuse for a tablet, for any age user
Reviews.Author: Michelle D.
Reviews.Content: The one star was given because we had to. Pros: Color choice, purchase price  Cons: Poor resolution, slow to load and the charge lasts about an hour. This tablet cannot be operated while plugged in to charger, and a full charge required 8-10 hours. This was sent back, and a better tablet was purchased. Don't waste your time or your money.

Reviews.Title: Damaged camera and USB port does not work
Reviews.Author: Ping
Reviews.Content: I received the tablet with enthusiasm. It worked fine until I realize that the camera shows static. There is not even a glimpse of image. I have never been able to use it. Also i tried to connect my flashdrive and other USB devices to it but they do not show up. I contacted the seller but I am yet to receive a response. I am not pleased with my purchase and the poor customer service.

Reviews.Title: Ahhhhhhhhh!
Reviews.Author: Ran
Reviews.Content: The tablet has not broken down.. YET!  I'm waiting for it (It's my 6 year old's tablet).  My problem with the tablet is everything that came with it was garbage and timed for self destruction.  The stylus lasted 1 literal day the connector lasted 2 literal days; haven't used the usb adapter so its still around.. The screen protector latest about 1 week.. Again i'm waiting for the tablet to go if it was also built to this quality.The stylus point pushed in; The connector was brittle and the prongs broke into the case... 2 Stars..As far as the tablet its self it is working pretty well; expected speed, response and cam image quality...

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Tester
Reviews.Content: Do not buy if children under 7 years of age it lasted us about 6months. Bought two, and both screen cracked.

Reviews.Title: Cheap Present
Reviews.Author: Regina Gamble
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday day present for my daughter it does not have flash camera like it was noted false advertisement also it looked used I should of taken it out of the box before I gave it to her and  she did not receive the earphones and something else it was suppose to come with it.  I ordered this  back in April because it was cheap.  Now I see Zeepad has taken the part out about flash camera and reduced the price.  I would not recommended this to someone over the age of 5.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for Kids
Reviews.Author: K. Lucas
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these to save my Kindle from my 5 year old twins.  They love them so much, I now have to pry the zeepads out of their hands to get them to come to dinner.  This is NOT the same calibre tablet as the Kindle Fire HD or the iPad, or Samsung!  The screen is not HD, the touch sensors are sluggish, the processor is not fast and the battery life is relatively short.  That said, it works perfectly in the twin's small hands and gives them access to games and a camera AND it has the capacity for more memory.  I am happy give them this much power for less than $100.  I'm not sure how long they will last, but so far I don't regret my purchase at all.  Over all, I am happy with them.

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: crazymama7
Reviews.Content: This item is horrible..from day one I had serious problems with it, it will not hold a charge, it freezes up constantly,shuts off by itself, it is very slow!!! It is the worst tablet you can purchase!

Reviews.Title: Not a good tablet.
Reviews.Author: Mildred P. Gomez
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Zeepad for my daughter in January.  For some reason the color of the screens is turning green.  It started off with some parts of the pictures were not the right color but now almost the whole screen has the wrong color. I made sure that the color setting was correct. The seller would not exchange it for us.  after only owning it for less than 4 months my daughter is not able to use her tablet.

Reviews.Title: Won't turn on
Reviews.Author: Tracy Youngquist
Reviews.Content: I puchased 3 for xmas gifts for my 2 10 year olds and an 8 year old and a month in they won't turn on.  Waste of money:(

Reviews.Title: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
Reviews.Author: Ana C. McCarthy
Reviews.Content: face it, this is a cheap device, it's a little slow BUT it's never crashed! If you're patient, it does all that it is required to do. I had a little problem connecting the charger just as i was approaching 3 month ownership. Very disappointed was i. I contacted HD Design through Amazon here and WITHOUT question, without wanting the old device, they shipped a new one! Thank You HD-Design, I am VERY happy. -Ana

Reviews.Title: It is a piece of trash
Reviews.Author: susan foster
Reviews.Content: I will never ever buy another one. I have had so many problems with it, And I have told everyone that I know to never buy one. It isn't even worth a penny in my opinion. I have had to do 3 factory restores due to it being encrypted. The battery power only lasts like 45 minutes. And I had a few games that I downloaded and ended up with someone else's information. I am extremely disappointed.

Reviews.Title: It was great for about 10mins
Reviews.Author: tmac_91
Reviews.Content: If this product boots up, it's a fantastic value.  Touch screen is very responsive, and the tablet seems pretty robust.However, the unit I ordered only booted up one time.  It was completely dead after that, even after days of charging.  Returning it for a refund.  Save your money and buy something better.

Reviews.Title: STOP ITS NOT WORTH IT
Reviews.Author: Asaelfreezing
Reviews.Content: I bought this a few weeks ago and all it does is freeze and reboot on its own the tablet camera is terrible for 40 I at least expect it to run smoothly but I guess I can't even get that don't waste your money on this

Reviews.Title: great pc tablet!!!!
Reviews.Author: Annette  Freeman
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet the touch sensitivity is awesome, great for playing games on.lots of apps to choose from on goolgle.watching movies on netflix is wonderful youtube is great also!!! just a wonderful tablet all around!!!! also receieved  tablet 10 days before estimated delivery date!love ordering from amazon~

Reviews.Title: awful
Reviews.Author: MissKorey
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for. Very very basic but the apps don't work! Not one app I loaded worked so I returned it and just paid double for a kindle instead .

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: Ellamae brown
Reviews.Content: i like it but it didn't evin last two weeks because its not worken any moor.its not chargein.its no moor use to me

Reviews.Title: Smh
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Kia
Reviews.Content: This product does not hold the charge. I did exactly what the directions told me to do and the charge was gone within 30mins to and hour. So I got my kids iPad minis. They love them

Reviews.Title: Keeps Freezing
Reviews.Author: DC
Reviews.Content: Purchased this item for my nephew for his 6th birthday. It was a great price and when it arrived I thought it was the perfect weight and size for a 6 year old to handle/manage. Unfortunately, on first use the zeepad froze up repeatedly and requireed rebooting. Planning to return it to vendor today.

Reviews.Title: cheap
Reviews.Author: Katherine M. Lovsey "KML"
Reviews.Content: got this to go with a tablet for my niece. she doesn't use it because it only works half the time.

Reviews.Title: beyond awesome
Reviews.Author: effy
Reviews.Content: I luv this tablet. I was worried how well it would work and if I had to buy a bigger memory card right away but the amount of memory it comes with is plenty for all the apps and games I want to play. It works really good and I luv the fact that my tablets pink and the same size as those ipad minis for wayyyyyy less money. The tablet got shipped to me sooner than the expected date too. All in all I'm searching these guys for all my electronics purchases from now on. Great job you guys. Excellent customer service.

Reviews.Title: WARNING PIECE OF CRAP DON'T BUY
Reviews.Author: Jamie S. Mustard "~J-ME~"
Reviews.Content: Bought 3 of these in Feb and 1 month later only one of them still works.  There is no rest button on them and they won't hold a charge.  I want my money back but I know I will never get it.  When looking it up online since there is no brand name (and ZeePad is not a brand name) you can't find any info on the piece of S***.  Not only am I pissed about this but you have screwed my kids over.  Thanks for nothing.

Reviews.Title: i love my zeepad
Reviews.Author: feelin the burn
Reviews.Content: i was a little nervous with the limited reviews and the low price, but it is exactly what i was looking for. i can watch Netflix on it with no problems and play games.I have not only recommended it took friends, but three of them have since bought one for them selves.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: Natasha Elliott
Reviews.Content: Well I bought this for my 11 yr. Old son. I had to return another one because it malfunctioned. But so far this is working fine

Reviews.Title: Like it a lot for the price
Reviews.Author: Roxanne D. Carroll "Brain Ninja"
Reviews.Content: If you are not looking for an expensive pad, this one is very good. It can be slow at times, but it works great. Took it on a road trip with my daughter and with the small mini usb to usb connector, I was able to plug in my flash drive I loaded with tons of movies. Uses google play store, so i was able to gt all my apps on there. I was also easily able to get my kindle app on there and use it.

Reviews.Title: Great fo the price
Reviews.Author: Erik Schrauger
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my kid and she loves it. It's better than the one I paid more for and broke already.

Reviews.Title: Advertised together with 7" Zeepad but they are not compatible
Reviews.Author: Raul Dominguez
Reviews.Content: I bought the pair, hard cover case and 7" Zeepad as recommended by Amazon, I got both on time and in good working condition, but when I tried to connect them together the Zeeppad does not "see" the keyboard. I tested the keyboard with my laptop and it does work fine. I contacted both manufacturers and they blame each other by not accepting any responsibility. In other words, they do not advertise their products together, but Amazon does. Other than that, the tablet works fine, as expected.Update: After trial an error, I found the adaptor USB to mini USB that came with the tablet to be the defective link. Both devices work fine now. I am now upgrading the tablet to 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Works like a dream
Reviews.Author: Joshua Thaler
Reviews.Content: bought recently and has worked wonderfully, I got the android keyboard case to go with it and works just as well as a netbook, compaired to my android phone I have yet to fill up half the memory and have 3 times the apps installed.  have yet to find any boatware that really takes up much space.

Reviews.Title: I love it. Purchased it for my kids. Great product at a great price.
Reviews.Author: J. Owen "jdog"
Reviews.Content: Great product at a great price. Perfect for kids first tablet. Easy to download games for thekids. They love it..

Reviews.Title: it was pink and what we thought it would be....  she wanted a tablet but this was cheaper and does the same thing
Reviews.Author: Beverley Pomeroy  Beverley Pomeroy
Reviews.Content: it was what she thought it would be... she uses it daily..she loves it....  i have been thinking about getting one

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Cyndi "Cyndi"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my 5 year old grandaughter for Christmas.  She loves it and it does everything that my verizon tablet does, and I paid a lot more for my tablet.  I would recommend this for a child to use for games.  You can also download google play for music.  If you want to use to check email or search the internet.  You can also do those things as well as download apps.  It is a great price!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Krista
Reviews.Content: Easy to use convienent and my kids love it! Great product, would deff recommend especially for the price! Awesome tablet

Reviews.Title: unable yo unlock
Reviews.Author: ROBERT DEVERNAY
Reviews.Content: locked by 9 yr old using patterns..unable to unlock a month later ,spent hrs on the net, still no answers.. any help? anyone?

Reviews.Title: good little tablet for the money
Reviews.Author: Sergio
Reviews.Content: Considering the price this is a good tablet. Do not expect nexus 7 performance. It can get laggy especially if multitasking. Battery life depends on usage, but anywhere between 2and 3 h. I bought it for my 3 year old niece and for what she needs it, it is great.

Reviews.Title: Way better than expected for cost
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This was my third attempt at buying my 14 to son a tablet. The others had been nothing but problems. I did not hold out much hope for this one as it was $40 cheaper than the others I had tried but to my great surprise it has worked great with no glitches at all. Easy to use, access to google play, decent video.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Had problems from the get go. I guess you get what you pay for. I ended up buying the samsung galaxy 7'' and Im happy with it.

Reviews.Title: works fine my granddaughter loves the games
Reviews.Author: Faye Powe
Reviews.Content: no problems with tablet I cannot steal it from my granddaughter. She will play her games and put it back in the case.She's only 2***

Reviews.Title: Aweful product
Reviews.Author: Disappointed customer
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these for my kids and none of them worked. I sent all of them back. The product was poorly made and even though the price was low, the product was even lower.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: This is our first tablet an I think it's great for what we use it for an a great start ;)

Reviews.Title: Sent it back
Reviews.Author: Dancherd
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 11 yr old with restrictions on when she could use it providing homework is done, chores are done etc. With that stipulation, to protect her from being tempted, and because I am smart, I put a password on it. At first I used the slide lock. Well I forgot the combination but after 3 tries it asked if I wanted to open with my google account. Nice save! So still feeling pretty sure of myself I set a password and left for work. Returning home to find her chores done, homework done and room clean  she earned play time. I have to admit that after hours of trying every combination of what I thought the password was, I was never able to unlock it.I take full responsibility for forgetting the password. I give this tablet a low rating because there is NO reset button!! Before sending back I searched for hours on the internet looking for help on how to reset it. For the money it is not a bad product and my daughter enjoyed it for her first tablet. But what are the chances that she would set a password and forget later on without any way to reset it? With the slide lock after 3 tries it did give the option to override and we were able to get in. With the password however, I tried over 300 combinations and never got the option to open with my google account. I saw many other sites with the same complaint but never found an answer. Nor was I able to find the manufacturer info to call and ask if there was a way to reset the tablet. So I sent it back and will try another brand.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money!
Reviews.Author: Laura Harwick
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my son for Christmas.  He played it maybe 10 times before it stopped working.  The backlight will turn on for a few seconds, but no picture will show up.  I ordered these early so it is past the date available to return the item.  Very disappointed!

Reviews.Title: i did not like it
Reviews.Author: brittany
Reviews.Content: it was not the kind of tablet that i wanted.i want one that has a front and back cam. that what i want

Reviews.Title: resets
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: My son got this for Christmas from his grandma. He likes it other then his angry birds games keep resetting. He is getting very frustrated with it now.

Reviews.Title: 7" tablet
Reviews.Author: william hyatt
Reviews.Content: works great, can download all apps.  just as good as an ipad for 1/4th of the cost.  i would suggest this product to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Bought by a mom for a teen
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I just got our zeepad. Thus far, I must write a review on what I am experiencing for other non-tech savvy moms considering this for a kid to use for homework applications. I have it on the charger, and whoo boy! I can tell right from the box that the charger connection is going to be an issue! On the plus side~ there are ample attachments/wires/accessories, for the price. I have a usb adapter, headphones, the charger, and an adapter for the keyboard (keyboard NOT included!). The charging connection is wonky enough to mention to anyone considering this purchase. The price is nice, and I am still optimistic that it will do what I need it to do, but be forewarned on the charger not fitting into the pad snugly. You will have to keep an eye on it and make sure it doesn't get jostled.

Reviews.Title: Could be better
Reviews.Author: JeffWeisbaker
Reviews.Content: The keyboard does not pickup correctly sometimes, It cannot find wifi spots and The  keyboardcase i have will not operate when connected to the pad. am think about colntacting the seller about returning it .

Reviews.Title: Basic tablet
Reviews.Author: A, CHRISTIE
Reviews.Content: I havent used an expensive tablet before but this one still seems a little cheap.It works fine but the instructions were written by a foreigner and really donthelp with the use at all. You just have to figure it out as you go which is mostlynot to hard. I havent figured out how to have a favorites list yet.Overall a decent value for the price but dont expect anything like an IPad.

Reviews.Title: Not usable
Reviews.Author: Garry
Reviews.Content: Ok, it is an inexpensive tablet. My biggest problem with it was out of the box it would not turn on. Could not really get a good read on performance. Once it did start it was very slow and response time was horrible. I assume something was amiss with the processor. The absolute great news is the unit was returned and my money credited back without delay. Amazon Rocks!

Reviews.Title: This tablet is horrible
Reviews.Author: A. Burgett
Reviews.Content: This tablet is HORRIBLE!!! Every 2 hours you have to charge it, wi-fi runs REALLY slow, it freezes all the time, and the screen will break if you hardy even drop it. I thought I was getting a good  deal but-NO. I am going to throw this away! Do NOT buy this!!! I am going to buy an apple product (ipad) those are good items.

Reviews.Title: Cheap fabrication
Reviews.Author: Max
Reviews.Content: Screen is too slim while time you touch screen with a small pressure and you can see a black spot by your finger ...Battery is holding for 25 min ... It means its usseless .....To slow  TouCh screen most games doesn't feel a touch screenBorough this tablet for my wife only because review said is great tablet -IT'S NOT

Reviews.Title: don't buy this
Reviews.Author: Anna Seeger "the goodbee girl"
Reviews.Content: The tablet came with a cracked screen.  Sent it back right after Christmas. Waiting to hear from vender that he received it.

Reviews.Title: fabulous tablet
Reviews.Author: Charmaine White "CWhite"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet for my 7 yrs grandson. He loves this tablet. This tablet is a good purchase for people who are not tech savvy.  However, sometimes it freezes, but, all you have to do is turn off the tablet and turn back on. Netflix works perfect on this tablet. My grandson downloads lots of games. FYI you might want to invest in a micro SD card for more memory. other than that, this is a fabulous tablet.

Reviews.Title: Wow!!
Reviews.Author: jnrpetty79
Reviews.Content: We ordered this product for my daughters birthday. We were attracted by the price and thought if she breaks it, no big deal. We received the tablet and we charged it and downloaded some games so she could start playing right away. She was so excited. But she only got to play with it for ten minutes before she had to go to church. Upon returning home, the tablet wouldn't power on at all or show any signs of life. The back of the tablet was hot. Needless to say we are getting our money back and going with a Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: mel
Reviews.Content: this was bought as a gift for my niece and  nephew they loved it .The product met my expectations and I am more than happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: zee tablet
Reviews.Author: JOHN R GUSTKE
Reviews.Content: We gave this to our 8 yr. old grand daughter for her 8th birthday. She loves it  and has been able to download many free games. It is very user friendly.

Reviews.Title: new zee-pad
Reviews.Author: phyllis neal
Reviews.Content: the item was not what it was advertised as i can not get on you tube,or online movies i was sadly disappointed

Reviews.Title: Poor product amd service
Reviews.Author: MIchele Hall
Reviews.Content: When i purchesed this item to be used for games it looked good, but it wont load most games and when you can get into the games to you dont have the home button to leave the screen. I emailed the company to return it and they refused to take to back. I wouldnt recommend this product or the company it was purchased through.

Reviews.Title: MY REVIEW OF ZEEPAD 7.0
Reviews.Author: albert
Reviews.Content: LOW VOLUME NEED HEADPHONES TO HEAR THE SOUND. WHAT CAN I DO ?  HELP! OTHER THEN THAT IT'S OK.SEND ME A E-MAIL ON WHAT I CAN DO.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: Scathey
Reviews.Content: When I  first received these items, they worked pretty good and then after about 2 weeks one of them quit working completely.. I bought these for my younger girls but just decided to send them back and get something else..u get what u pay for! I do have to say the shipping was great.. They got here in two days!

Reviews.Title: Screen too thin
Reviews.Author: shyla siems
Reviews.Content: The screen is already cracked. My daughter has only had it for a month and the screen is cracked. She has used my Kindle for over a year with no issues. OPS is fine. Games and other apps were fine. Just needs to be more durable.

Reviews.Title: This is the worst product I have ever purchased
Reviews.Author: PhilMo
Reviews.Content: I know you get what you pay for but I expected it to at least be useable. The charger fell apart the first day. Within a week it no longer could stay charged. The only way to use it was to have it connected to a power supply. It kept switching back to what I think was Japanese. It wouldn't remember the WIFI so we had to set it up at least once a week. It is very slow to respond when you touch the screen. It feels so cheap that I was afraid it would snap in half. Please stay away from the horrible device. Its so bad, I wouldn't pay $15 for it.

Reviews.Title: Terrible product! Great customer service!
Reviews.Author: Tobi
Reviews.Content: Purchased for a Christmas gift to my 10 year old. Worked well for the first day. On day 2, the screen had lines running across it. Also, the screen began to flash while using this item. So, unfortunately, I sent it back right away. This left my son with no tablet until I could return this one and purchase another brand. But, the customer service was wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Great table
Reviews.Author: Bunny
Reviews.Content: Ordered it just before Christmas...got it on time!!!  It was a gift and the person who got it loves it.

Reviews.Title: i need a new one
Reviews.Author: meiko
Reviews.Content: it stopped working after 2 days and i have not recieved my new one ,an i  have not recieved a phone call or nothing

Reviews.Title: I was amazed!!
Reviews.Author: melba burks
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my 18 year old son.  It was inexpensive and I didn't expect much and I was shocked at how much we got! It was well worth every penny.  Easy to use, easy to connect to wifi, easy to download apps too.  Can add external memory if you need.  I would recommend this and I was pleased.  As was my son! My son in law works at Best Buy, and of course is a gadget man and he was impressed.  No it's not an ipad.  But, it is worth the penny if you want to be able to facebook, Skype and watch Netflix with ease.

Reviews.Title: BUYER BEWARE.. ITS A CRAP SHOOT!! and we lost!!
Reviews.Author: dawn fillinger
Reviews.Content: This is the thing, The Zeepad came from Goodios and it worked GREAT for exactly 3 hours!! then the wifi wouldn't stay on and the audio went out!! My tech looked at it, and said the wifi card was dead, so I could buy a new one, but since it was less then 5 hours old,send it back!! NOW I did read all of the comments, and this company has a great reputation,but this product when it works for people its fantastic, when it doesn't well I had a tearful child!! So is this the sellers fault? how do i rate this with anything but a 1 when the product failed so miserably even if the seller was fine? I mean i didn't contact the seller amazon did, so im assuming they treated amazon as they would me on that note they get 5 stars, BUT again why are they not testing these tablets out, I mean its a real crap shoot when you buyt this, as you can see some people got lucky and what they bought was awesome, I gambled and lost I bought it crossed my fingers and got a defective one:( i am not going to buy another one, I'm not sure what I'm going to do but this tablet form any of the sellers is not the answer for my family!!I got to my house on time, they DO NEED to package it better!! its in a small box with no bubble wrap or packing material of any kind, and then that box is in another box,(just rattling around) this may be why some are getting cracked screens, plus it(the tablet) was ice cold, I dont know if that would break it, but I'm sure it doesn't help. Maybe that's what happened! For the person who wanted a instructional guide..I got one, it had no adjectives in it, and it didn't help with , why did the sound go out?? so you really dont need one, as everything else is pretty easy to understand, it was funny though!!SO Im giving the tablet 1 star, I rolled a dice, and the seller will get a 5 but for the purposes here, I'm giving it 1 star. So it is definitely buyer BEWARE!! ( I didn't make 2 separate reviews 1 for product 1 for the seller, so I only made this one and included everything!) I do wish I could give the product no stars!!

Reviews.Title: What the heck
Reviews.Author: Eezyboy504
Reviews.Content: Still haven't received my package from these people. My daughter waiting to open her tablet and still not here after 3 days this is BS I AM REALLY upset I want my money back

Reviews.Title: xmas gift.
Reviews.Author: jaymoe "value shopper"
Reviews.Content: So far I have not opened it but the 5 star is for the shipper. They were FAST!!!. Got it in 3 days

Reviews.Title: Wonderful little tablet
Reviews.Author: Phillip Arnett
Reviews.Content: Wonderful little tab. I have given these to 3 of my 4 grandchildren. They have found them easy to use and understand. A protective face would be nice however. The young ones are quite a bid harder on the screen. They are only 5,4 and 21/2 years old !!

Reviews.Title: Very nice little tablet
Reviews.Author: jorge a. rivas
Reviews.Content: I bought 3 of these tablets, for my three boy and they love these tablets, don't have trouble connecting to the internet or using them, the camera is not an excellent camera that can take pictures of a 5 mp camera, so don't be thinking you can use the camera to take quality pictures  But a lot of more expensive tablets out there have the same quality cameras. they are well build my youngest boy has drop his a few times and still working good. for the price this was a good deal and yes I will recommend it to any body.

Reviews.Title: Cheap junk
Reviews.Author: Fred Friendly
Reviews.Content: I purchased 4 of these and after using them for a couple of months I can honestly say they are absolute crap.Pros:Has Google Play and plays YouTube.Andriod seems to be stable and we have had few crashes.Performance is reasonable for a sub $100 tablet.Wifi seems to be stable and does not drop out but signal receptions is relatively weak.Cons:The screen is very easily scratched.  The manufacturer apparently knew this and included a screen protector.  However, the protector is of very low quality and peels off and/or develops air bubbles after a few days.One of the units had some problems with the internals and if you put your finger on back it in a specific spot it would create a distortion pattern on the screen in the front.One unit was DOA.  The touch screen had a dead spot (which happened to line up with the "S" key on the onscreen keyboard making it unusable.  In general, the touch screens are of low quality.  All of them have manufacturing defects like embedded dust particles in the plastic (that become evident after installing the screen protector)  indicating they were produced in a low quality facility.The power button on one of the units has already failed and no longer powers on or off the unit.The screen is a critical feature of a tablet and this one fails miserably on all counts.  It is cheap Chinese crap and should be avoided.I got frustrated and purchased a Nextbook in Walmart for the same price as one of these units and the difference in quality is astounding.  The Nextbook is light years ahead of the Zeepad.

Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Operation is inconsistent.  Freezes up too much. USB port appears to only be for charging. Touch screen response is inconsistent. Internet access is only by WIFI.  Doesn't appear to be upgradeable (hardware, ram). Cool idea for a beginning tablet/device for a preteen or displaying video work. The price is attractive but don't look to be too impressed once you receive it. Instruction booklet was poorly put together.  My ten year old daughter has better composition.  Packaging, presentation and operation make it reminiscent of a "knockoff" or "bootleg". I guess you buy cheap, you get cheap!

Reviews.Title: All we expected and more
Reviews.Author: LadyAylan
Reviews.Content: After reading a ton of product reviews, I ran across this listing.  At the time it only had 26 reviews total.  But even the negative reviews were helpful.  This being said, I am an owner of a Galaxy Epic cell phone, and know what the "average" tablet can do (all my cell does, just a bit bigger).  This tablet could and does compete with the Galaxy.  I admit there are a few things the Galaxy has as features this tablet doesnt do, but for the most part it can do all you need (unless you are a high end user).  This tab comes with just under 1gb memory onboard.  I do recommend you buy an 8gb micro SD card (TF card) to go with when ordering as most aps want to install to the card.  Set up was easy and second nature~ no having to flash the bios, or other such nonsense that many other no-name tablets had on their reviews to get Google Play (market).  We purchased 2 with "Christmas Money" and we are discussing saving up for 2 to 5 more (we are a family of 7).  They are reasonably priced, and well made, and fit our families needs.****UPDATED**** Battery expanded and after 9 mo no longer works.  The battery broke open the Tablet.  I am disappointed.  The child who this tablet belonged to, was not hard on the item, and it had been on the shelf for a couple weeks when we went back to get it, it had broke.

Reviews.Title: Waste of Money
Reviews.Author: Stacie Collins
Reviews.Content: Daughter dropped one time and it broke. Waste of money. Next time i will go with the little bit more expensive one!

Reviews.Title: fantastic & affordable!
Reviews.Author: A.S.
Reviews.Content: Just received this in the mail, it came in a very timely fashion.  We chose to buy this for our ten year old boy instead of an ipod touch for many reasons.  First, he wanted it solely for the purpose of playing games, as he already has an ipod nano.  He has asked for the ipod touch for Christmas, but I hope he is pleasantly surprised as we are!  Secondly - affordability!  My teenage son and I already went onto the playstore and downloaded apps, and I looked in his backpack for the books he is reading and downloaded them so he can read them anywhere! I am certain he will love the netflix and the angry birds along with the other games it comes with.  Bought an extra micro SD card, have set it up wifi in our house.  Love it love it.  Works well so far, hopefully it will continue with regular use!  Thank you for the previous reviews I read which helped me feel confident in this purchase.  The one in particular I agreed with - you can't compare this to the ipad - it's just a perfect mini ipad for games, movies and fun.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0
Reviews.Author: Brittany Clay
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these for my boys. What a waste of money. The speakers barely work. I hate this item.

Reviews.Title: zeepad has not yet come
Reviews.Author: dasarge
Reviews.Content: I am currently deployed to Afghanistan and my wife ordered 2 of these for x-mas and have yet to be seen. This is complete BS !!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Novak
Reviews.Content: Ive finally receive my tablet, it came earlier than expected...Give me A Hr to critique the product for my next review thanks.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't really work all that well
Reviews.Author: J. W. Horton
Reviews.Content: We bought this to be able to skype or oovoo with our granddaughter. The wi-fi does not connect well to the internet and there is a lot of noise on the line. The camera does not work. She could see us and hear us but we could only hear her. There are no directions included and no customer service line. We should have realized this was a bad buy when it was going to take 30 days to ship from China. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!

Reviews.Title: TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE @ TOYS R US
Reviews.Author: Venus Flytrap
Reviews.Content: I had a very disappointing experience yesterday in Toys R Us Hato Rey Puerto Rico I recently purchased a 7 inch Tabeo Tablet for my daughter during the month of December. The thing is the equipment turned out to be defective tablet wont turn, the screen didn't work. So I went yesterday to the Toys R US Where I bought it the one in Hato Rey, Puerto Rico, to have it exchanged by another tablet or for a refund. And not only did I wait sooo long in line I was attended by this obnoxious assistant manager , whom which after looking @ the tablet just simply told me she couldn't accept the tablet because the manufacturing company wouldn't accept it. I told her the Tablet had arrived like this yet she didn't do much or anything to help out in this situation. All I can say is that Toys R US.. should emphasize more on customer service which is very low quality, they don't seem to hire a lot of employees although the stores are very big. Sometimes you have to walk around for a while through out the whole store in order to receive some assistance by a employee. As far as this situation I feel totally robbed/Scammed for my money. Employees are supposed to assist customers diligently and efficiently on any situation. But I just sensed they don't really care even though my daughter was next to me while I was trying to exchange the item ( Which obviously made her very sad, she wouldn't stop crying on the way back home.) I simply don't understand why wouldn't Toys R US exchange my item or give me a full refund it seems there always some sort of controversy or excuse to their own benefit  when it comes to exchanges or refunds. Other stores like Game Stop, Electronics Boutique, Wal-Mart,  Amazon won't give those obstacles when it comes to exchanging a item which they also sell a whole lot CHEAPER. Iam beyond indignated because the store manager totally wiped her butt with my receipt ( The purchase had been made less than a month ago) And even though  she did admit the Tablets were in fact coming with defects  she declined to offer any assistance or a exchange, refund, store credit whatsoever. Usually I never really buy often in Toys R Us... because there isn't located where I live & because I don't find the prices of the items cheap or affordable.. compared to Wal-Mart or K-mart or Game Stop , AMAZON . But this incident totally made it for Iam never BUYING ANYTHING ON TOYS R US ... EVER AGAIN.. and will give NEGATIVE RECOMMENDATIONS to relatives and Close ones based on my Personal EXPERIENCE. I WILL NEVER BUY HERE EVER AGAIN. EVER AGAIN, EVER AGAIN. THEIR  RETURN POLICE IS A VERY FICTIONAL POLICY.

Reviews.Title: uneasy feeling customer
Reviews.Author: msthomas
Reviews.Content: Ordered 2 zeepads and I'm  waiting to see when items will actually arrive...I have been feeling really uneasy about my transaction with seller with all the current negative reviece lately. I think once I finally (if I ever) receive my items even if on time I dont believe I'll use them again. Per reviews they seem a little suspect. I hope im wrong..next review to be continued......

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected at all
Reviews.Author: Troy Hall "trytroy24"
Reviews.Content: The battery life is severely lacking. The UI is not horrible. I bought this as an easy alternative for my Mom to use in order to keep up on Facebook activities and emails and she had issues with this device. On the bright side, my 4 year old loves it and we have dld games on it for him to play. Again, battery life an issue with that as well as it only lasts about an hour till dead from video game play.
